Then [she]389-his wife went up to a mirror and attentively scrutinized [herself]389-his wife . The light was unbecoming , perhaps ... the shade of the adjacent wall - candle had slipped out of place . [She]389-his wife readjusted it ... yes , that was better ! But of course , at nearly midnight -- and after such a [day!--a woman]1608-day!--a woman was bound to look a little drawn . Automatically [her]389-his wife lips shaped the familiar : " [Pauline]108-pauline , do n't worry : there 's nothing in [the world]303-the world to worry about . "[389-his wife] But the rouge had vanished from the lips , their thin line looked blue and arid . [She]389-his wife turned from the unpleasing sight , putting out one light after another on the way to [[her]389-his wife dressing - room]454-her dressing - room . As [she]389-his wife bent to extinguish the last lamp its light struck a tall framed photograph : [Lita]105-lita 's latest portrait . [Lita]105-lita had the gift of posing -- the lines [she]105-lita fell into always had an unconscious eloquence . And that little round face , as sleek as the inside of a shell ; the slanting eyes , the budding mouth ... [men]2738-men , no doubt , would think it all enchanting . [Pauline]108-pauline , with slow steps , went on into [the big shining dressing - room]1611-the big shining dressing - room , and to [the bathroom beyond]1612-the bathroom beyond , all ablaze with white tiling and silvered taps and tubes . It was the hour of [her]108-pauline evening uplift exercises , the final relaxing of body and soul before [she]108-pauline slept . Sternly [she]108-pauline addressed [herself]108-pauline to relaxation . XVII WHAT was the sense of it all ? [Nona]102-nona , sitting up in bed two days after [her]102-nona nocturnal visit to [the Housetop]3185-the housetop , swept the interval with a desolate eye . [She]102-nona had made [her]102-nona great , [her]102-nona final , refusal . [She]102-nona had sacrificed [herself]102-nona , sacrificed [Heuston]143-aggie , to the stupid ideal of [an obstinate woman who managed to impress [people]437-people by dressing up [her]102-nona egotism in formulas of philanthropy and piety]1614-an obstinate woman who managed to impress people by dressing up her egotism in formulas of philanthropy and piety . Because [Aggie]143-aggie was forever going to [church]2879-church , and bossing the committees of [[Old Women]229-old women 's Homes]1617-old women 's homes and Rest - cures for [Consumptives]1618-consumptives , [she]143-aggie was allowed a license of cruelty which would have damned the frivolous . Destroying two lives to preserve [her]143-aggie own ideal of purity ! It was like [the horrible ailing old men in history books]1619-the horrible ailing old men in history books , who used to bathe in human blood to restore [their]1619-the horrible ailing old men in history books vitality . [Every one]1005-every one agreed that there was nothing such [a clever sensitive fellow]1621-a clever sensitive fellow as [Stanley Heuston]137-heuston might n't have made of [his]137-heuston life if [he]137-heuston 'd married [a different kind of woman]1622-a different kind of woman . As it was , [he]137-heuston had just drifted : tried the law , dabbled in literary reviewing , taken a turn at municipal politics , another at scientific farming , and dropped one experiment after another to sink , at thirty - five , into [a disillusioned idler who killed time with cards and drink and motor - speeding]1623-a disillusioned idler who killed time with cards and drink and motor - speeding . [She]143-aggie did n't believe [he]137-heuston ever opened a book nowadays : [he]137-heuston was living on [the dwindling capital of [his]137-heuston early enthusiasms]1624-the dwindling capital of his early enthusiasms . But , as for what [people]437-people called [his]137-heuston " fastness , "[143-aggie] [she]143-aggie knew it was merely the inevitable opposition to [Aggie]143-aggie 's virtues . And it was n't as if there had been [children]853-children . [Nona]102-nona always ached for [the bewildered progeny]1627-the bewildered progeny suddenly bundled from [one home]1628-one home to another when [[their]1627-the bewildered progeny parents]1629-their parents embarked on a new conjugal experiment ; [she]102-nona could never have bought [her]102-nona happiness by a massacre of [innocents]1630-innocents . But to be sacrificed to a sterile union -- as sterile spiritually as physically -- to miss youth and love because of [Agnes Heuston]143-aggie 's notion of [her]143-aggie duty to [the elderly clergyman [she]143-aggie called [God]145-god]1631-the elderly clergyman she called god ! [That woman [he]137-heuston said [he]137-heuston was going off with ... [Nona]102-nona]1632-that woman he said he was going off with ... nona had pretended [she]102-nona did n't know , had opened incredulous eyes at the announcement . But of course [she]102-nona knew ; [everybody]2612-everybody knew ; it was [Cleo Merrick]230-cleo merrick . [She]102-nona had been " after [him]137-heuston "[102-nona] for the last two years , [she]102-nona had n't a rag of reputation to lose , and would jump at the idea of a few jolly weeks with [a man like [Heuston]143-aggie]1634-a man like heuston , even if [he]137-heuston got away from [her]102-nona afterward . But [he]137-heuston wouldn't -- of course [he]137-heuston never would ! [Poor Stan]137-heuston -- [Cleo Merrick]230-cleo merrick 's noise , [her]102-nona cheek , [her]102-nona vulgarity : how warm and life - giving [they]1635-they would seem as a change from the frigidarium [he]137-heuston called [home]2630-home ! [She]102-nona would hold [him]137-heuston by [her]102-nona very cheapness : [her]102-nona recklessness would seem like generosity , [her]102-nona glitter like heat . Ah -- how [Nona]102-nona could have shown [him]137-heuston the difference ! [She]102-nona shut [her]102-nona eyes and felt [his]137-heuston lips on [her]102-nona lids ; and [her]102-nona lids became lips . Wherever [he]137-heuston touched [her]102-nona , a mouth blossomed ... Did [he]137-heuston know that ? Had [he]137-heuston never guessed ? [She]102-nona jumped out of bed , ran into [[her]102-nona dressing - room]454-her dressing - room , began to bathe and dress with feverish haste . [She]102-nona would n't telephone [him]137-heuston -- [Aggie]143-aggie had long ears . [She]102-nona would n't send [a " special delivery"--Aggie[102-nona] had sharp eyes]1638-a " special delivery"--aggie had sharp eyes . [She]102-nona would just summon [him]137-heuston by a telegram : a safe anonymous telegram . [She]102-nona would dash out of [the house]530-the house and get it off [herself]102-nona , without even waiting for [her]102-nona cup of coffee to be brought . " Come and see [me]102-nona any time today . [I]102-nona was too stupid the other night . "[102-nona] Yes ; [he]137-heuston would understand that . [She]102-nona need n't even sign it ... On the threshold of [[her]102-nona room]960-her room , the telegram crumpled in [her]102-nona hand , the telephone bell arrested [her]102-nona . [Stanley]137-heuston , surely ; [he]137-heuston must have felt the same need that [she]102-nona had ! [She]102-nona fumbled uncertainly with the receiver ; the tears were running down [her]102-nona cheeks . [She]102-nona had waited too long ; [she]102-nona had exacted the impossible of [herself]102-nona . " Yes -- yes ? It 's [you]137-heuston , [darling]2893-darling ? Well ; it was natural enough -- only perhaps [she]102-nona had better not be so glib about [Aggie Heuston]143-aggie 's selfishness ! Of course [everybody who was in love]1641-everybody who was in love was selfish ; and [Aggie]143-aggie , according to [her]143-aggie lights , was in love . [Her]143-aggie love was bleak and cramped , like everything about [her]143-aggie ; a sort of fleshless bony affair , like the repulsive plates in anatomical manuals . But in reality those barren arms were stretched toward [Stanley]137-heuston , though [she]102-nona imagined they were lifted to [God]145-god ... What a hideous mystery life was ! And yet [Pauline]108-pauline and [[her]108-pauline friends]2617-her friends persisted in regarding it as a Sunday school picnic , with lemonade and sponge cake as its supreme rewards ... Here was [Jim]110-jim at [her]102-nona sitting - room door . "[726-a man] That was the new idea of marriage , the view of [[Nona]102-nona 's contemporaries]1652-nona 's contemporaries ; it had been [her]102-nona own a few hours since . [[Her]102-nona brother]305-her brother turned to [her]102-nona ; the ghost of [his]305-her brother old smile drew up [his]305-her brother lip . " [Good old girl]3321-good old girl ! "[1661-he] [She]342-his mother put [her]342-his mother arms about [him]1661-he , and [he]1661-he submitted to [her]342-his mother kiss . " Give [me]342-his mother time , "[342-his mother] [she]342-his mother said , not knowing what else to answer . After [he]1661-he had gone [she]342-his mother sat motionless , weighed down with half - comprehended misery . This business of living -- how right [she]342-his mother had been to feel , in [her]342-his mother ignorance , what a tortured tangle it was ! Where , for instance , did [one]325-one 's own self end and [one 's neighbour]1524-one 's neighbour 's begin ? And how tell the locked tendrils apart in the delicate process of disentanglement ? [Her]342-his mother precocious half - knowledge of the human dilemma was combined with a youthful belief that the duration of pain was proportioned to its intensity . And at that moment [she]342-his mother would have hated [any one who had tried to persuade [her]342-his mother of the contrary]1667-any one who had tried to persuade her of the contrary . The only honourable thing about suffering was that it should not abdicate before indifference . [She]342-his mother got up , and [her]342-his mother glance fell on the telegram which [she]342-his mother had pushed aside when [[her]342-his mother brother]305-her brother entered . [She]342-his mother still had [her]342-his mother hat on , [her]342-his mother feet were turned toward the door . But the door seemed to open into a gray unpeopled world suddenly shorn of its magic . [She]342-his mother moved back into [the room]317-the room and tore up the telegram . XVIII " [LITA]105-lita ? But of course [I]103-dexter 'll talk to [Lita--]111-lita-- "[103-dexter] [Mrs. Manford]103-dexter , resting one elbow on [her]103-dexter littered desk , smiled up encouragingly at [[her]103-dexter daughter]917-her daughter . On the desk lay the final version of the Birth Control speech , mastered and canalized by [the skilful Maisie]104-maisie . The result was so pleasing that [Pauline]108-pauline would have liked to read it aloud to [Nona]102-nona , had [the latter]279-the latter not worn [her]279-the latter look of concentrated care . It was a pity , [Pauline]108-pauline thought , that [Nona]102-nona should let [herself]102-nona go at [her]102-nona age to these moods of anxiety and discouragement . [Pauline]108-pauline [herself]108-pauline , fortified by [her]108-pauline morning exercises , and by a " double treatment "[102-nona] ( $ 50 ) from [Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft , had soared once more above [her]108-pauline own perplexities . [She]108-pauline had not had time for a word alone with [[her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband since [their]1673-their strange talk of the previous evening ; but already the doubts and uncertainties produced by that talk had been dispelled . "[104-maisie] Fresh from a stimulating encounter with [Mrs. Swoffer]198-mrs. swoffer and [the encouragers of genius]1686-the encouragers of genius , [Pauline]108-pauline was able to face with a smiling composure [her]108-pauline meeting with [[her]198-mrs. swoffer daughter - in - law]1300-her daughter - in - law . [America]47-america really seemed to have an immediate answer for everything , from the treatment of the mentally deficient to the elucidation of the profoundest religious mysteries . " Well -- isn't [he]110-jim ? "[105-lita] [she]105-lita said in [her]105-lita cool silvery voice , with innocently widened eyes . For an instant the significance of the retort escaped [Pauline]108-pauline . When it reached [her]108-pauline [she]108-pauline felt as humiliated as if [she]108-pauline had been caught concealing a guilty secret . [She]108-pauline opened [her]108-pauline lips , but no sound came from them . [She]108-pauline sat wordless , torn between the desire to box [[her]108-pauline daughter - in - law]1300-her daughter - in - law 's ears , and to rush in tears from [the house]530-the house . " [Lita]105-lita ... "[105-lita] [she]105-lita gasped ... " this insult ... "[105-lita] [Lita]105-lita sat up , [her]105-lita eyes full of a slightly humorous compunction . " Oh , no ! An insult ! Why ? [I]105-lita 've always thought it would be so wonderful to have [a love - child]3416-a love - child . [I]105-lita supposed that was why [you]108-pauline both worshipped [Jim]110-jim . And now [he]110-jim is n't even that ! "[105-lita] [She]105-lita shrugged [her]105-lita slim shoulders , and held [her]105-lita hands out penitently . " [I]105-lita _ am _ sorry to have said the wrong thing -- honestly [I]105-lita am ! But it just shows [we]3417-we can never understand [each other]2681-each other . For [me]105-lita the real wickedness is to go on living with [a man [you]108-pauline do n't love]3419-a man you do n't love . And now [I]105-lita 've offended [you]108-pauline by supposing [you]108-pauline once felt in the same way [yourself]108-pauline ... "[105-lita] [Pauline]108-pauline slowly rose to [her]108-pauline feet : [she]108-pauline felt stiff and shrunken . " [You]108-pauline have n't offended [me]105-lita -- [I'm]105-lita not going to allow [myself]105-lita to be offended . [I]105-lita 'd rather think [we]3417-we do n't understand [each other]2681-each other , as [you]108-pauline say . But surely it 's not too late to try . [I]105-lita do n't want to discuss things with [you]108-pauline ; [I]105-lita do n't want to nag or argue ; [I]105-lita only want [you]108-pauline to wait , to come with [the baby]378-the baby to [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge , and spend a few quiet weeks with [us]3417-we . [Nona]102-nona will be [there]2641-there , and [[my]105-lita husband]2645-my husband ... there 'll be no reproaches , no questions ... but [we]3417-we 'll do [our]3417-we best to make [you]108-pauline happy ... "[105-lita] [Lita]105-lita , with [her]105-lita funny twisted smile , moved toward [[her]105-lita mother - in - law]904-her mother - in - law . " Why , [you]108-pauline 're actually crying ! [I]105-lita do n't believe [you]108-pauline do that often , do [you]108-pauline ? "[105-lita] [She]105-lita bent forward and put a light kiss on [Pauline]108-pauline 's shrinking cheek . " All right -- [I'll]105-lita come to [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge . [I]105-lita am dead - beat and fed - up , and [I]105-lita daresay it 'll do [me]105-lita a lot of good to lie up for a while ... "[105-lita] [Pauline]108-pauline , for a moment , made no answer : [she]108-pauline merely laid [her]108-pauline lips on [the girl]299-the girl 's cheek , a little timidly , as if it had been made of something excessively thin and brittle . " [We]3424-we shall all be very glad , "[108-pauline] [she]108-pauline said . On the doorstep , in the motor , [she]108-pauline continued to move in the resonance of the outrageous question : " _ Well_--_isn't [he]110-jim _ ? "[108-pauline] The violence of [her]108-pauline recoil left [her]108-pauline wondering what use there was in trying to patch up a bond founded on such a notion of marriage . Would not [Jim]110-jim , as [[his]110-jim wife]389-his wife so lightly suggested , run more chance of happiness if [he]110-jim could choose again ? Surely there must still be [some decent right - minded girls brought up in the old way]1722-some decent right - minded girls brought up in the old way ... like [Aggie Heuston]143-aggie , say ! But [Pauline]108-pauline 's imagination shivered away from that too ... Perhaps , after all , [her]108-pauline own principles were really obsolete to [[her]108-pauline children]286-her children . Only , what was to take [their]286-her children place ? Human nature had not changed as fast as social usage , and if [[Jim]110-jim 's wife]2874-jim 's wife left [him]110-jim nothing could prevent [his]110-jim suffering in the same old way . It was all very baffling and disturbing , and [Pauline]108-pauline did not feel as sure as [she]108-pauline usually did that the question could be disposed of by ignoring it . Still , on the drive [home]2630-home [her]108-pauline thoughts cleared as [she]108-pauline reflected that [she]108-pauline had gained [her]108-pauline main point -- for the time , at any rate . [Manford]103-dexter had enjoined [her]108-pauline not to estrange or frighten [Lita]105-lita , and [the two women]1726-the two women had parted with a kiss . [Manford]103-dexter had insisted that [Lita]105-lita should be induced to take no final decision till after [her]105-lita stay at [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge ; and to this also [she]105-lita had acquiesced . [Pauline]108-pauline , on looking back , began to be struck by the promptness of [Lita]105-lita 's surrender , and correspondingly impressed by [her]108-pauline own skill in manœuvring . There _ was _ something , after all , in these exercises of the will , these smiling resolves to ignore or dominate whatever was obstructive or unpleasant ! [She]108-pauline had gained with an almost startling ease the point which [Jim]110-jim and [Manford]103-dexter and [Nona]102-nona had vainly struggled for . And perhaps [Lita]105-lita 's horrid insinuation had not been a voluntary impertinence , but merely the unconscious avowal of new standards . [The young people]314-the young people nowadays , for all [their]314-the young people long words and scientific realism , were really more like [children]853-children than ever ... In [[Pauline]108-pauline 's boudoir]1729-pauline 's boudoir , [Nona]102-nona , curled up on the hearth , [her]102-nona chin in [her]102-nona hands , raised [her]102-nona head at [[her]102-nona mother]276-her mother 's approach . To [Pauline]108-pauline the knowledge that [she]108-pauline was awaited , and that [she]108-pauline brought with [her]108-pauline the secret of defeat or victory , gave back the healing sense of authority . " It 's all right , [darling]2893-darling , "[108-pauline] [she]108-pauline announced ; " just a little summer shower ; [I]108-pauline always told [you]2893-darling there was nothing to worry about . "[108-pauline] And [she]108-pauline added with a smile : " [You]2893-darling see , [Nona]102-nona , [some people]3426-some people _ do _ still listen when [[your]2893-darling old mother]3427-your old mother talks to [them]3426-some people . "[108-pauline] XIX IF only [Aggie Heuston]143-aggie had changed those sour - apple curtains in [the front drawing - room]1731-the front drawing - room , [Nona]102-nona thought -- if [she]143-aggie had substituted deep upholstered armchairs for the hostile gilt seats , and put books in the marqueterie cabinets in place of blue china dogs and [Dresden shepherdesses]1732-dresden shepherdesses , everything in three lives might have been different ... But [Aggie]143-aggie had probably never noticed the colour of the curtains or the angularity of the furniture . [She]102-nona had certainly never missed the books . [She]102-nona had accepted [the house]530-the house as it came to [her]102-nona from [[her]102-nona parents]1734-her parents , who in turn had taken [it]530-the house over , in all [its]530-the house dreary frivolity , from [[their]1734-her parents father]1735-their father and [mother]2638-mother . [It]530-the house embodied the [New York]2-new york luxury of the ' seventies in every ponderous detail , from the huge cabbage roses of the Aubusson carpet to the triple layer of curtains designed to protect [the aristocracy of the brown - stone age]1737-the aristocracy of the brown - stone age from the plebeian intrusion of light and air . " Funny , "[102-nona] [Nona]102-nona thought again--"that all this ugliness should prick [me]102-nona like nettles , and matter no more to [Aggie]143-aggie than if it were in [the next street]3428-the next street . [She]143-aggie 's [a saint]3429-a saint , [I]102-nona know . But what [I]102-nona want to find is a saint who hates ugly furniture , and yet lives among [it]530-the house with a smile . What 's the merit , if [you]3430-you never see it ? "[102-nona] [She]102-nona addressed [herself]102-nona to a closer inspection of one of the cabinets , in which [Aggie]143-aggie 's filial piety had preserved [[her]143-aggie mother]276-her mother 's velvet and silver spectacle - case , and [[her]143-aggie father]369-her father 's ivory opera - glasses , in combination with an alabaster Leaning Tower and a miniature copy of [Carlo Dolci]234-carlo dolci 's [Magdalen]235-magdalen . [Queer dead rubbish]1740-queer dead rubbish -- but queerer still that , at that moment and in [that house]1146-that house , [Nona]102-nona 's uncanny detachment should permit [her]102-nona to smile at it ! Where indeed -- [she]102-nona wondered again -- did [one]325-one 's own personality end , and that of others , of [people]437-people , landscapes , chairs or spectacle - cases , begin ? Ever since [she]102-nona had received , the night before , [Aggie]143-aggie 's stiff and agonized little note , which might have been composed by [a child with a tooth - ache]1744-a child with a tooth - ache , [Nona]102-nona had been apprehensively asking [herself]102-nona if [her]102-nona personality did n't even include certain shreds and fibres of [Aggie]143-aggie . It was all such an inextricable tangle ... Here [she]102-nona came . [Nona]102-nona heard the dry click of [her]102-nona steps on the stairs and across the polished bareness of [the hall]873-the hall . [She]102-nona had written : " If [you]3431-you could make it perfectly convenient to call-- "[102-nona] [Aggie]143-aggie 's nearest approach to a friendly summons ! And as [she]102-nona opened the door , and advanced over the cabbage roses , [Nona]102-nona saw that [her]102-nona narrow face , with the eyes too close together , and the large pale pink mouth with straight edges , was sharpened by a new distress . " It 's very kind of [you]102-nona to come , [Nona--]217-nona-- "[102-nona] [she]102-nona began in [her]102-nona clear painstaking voice . " Oh , nonsense , [Aggie]143-aggie ! Do drop all that . "[299-the girl] _ BOOK III _ XX AT [the gates of [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge]1756-the gates of cedarledge [Pauline]108-pauline lifted [her]108-pauline head from a last hurried study of the letters and papers [Maisie Bruss]104-maisie had thrust into the motor . The departure from [town]2627-town had been tumultuous . Up to the last minute there had been the usual rush and trepidation , [Maisie]104-maisie hanging on the footboard , [Powder]159-powder and [the maid]500-the maid hurrying down with final messages and recommendations . " Here 's another batch of bills passed by [the architect]3462-the architect , [Mrs. Manford]103-dexter . And [he]3462-the architect asks if [you]108-pauline 'd mind-- "[500-the maid] " Yes , yes ; draw another cheque for five thousand , [Maisie]104-maisie , and send it to [me]159-powder with the others to be signed . "[159-powder] " And the estimates for [the new orchid - house]3463-the new orchid - house . [The contractor]3464-the contractor says building - materials are going up again next week , and [he]3462-the architect ca n't guarantee , unless [you]108-pauline telephone at once-- "[159-powder] " Has [madame]3465-madame the jewel - box ? And [Pauline]108-pauline [herself]108-pauline was desperately tired , though [she]108-pauline had taken a " triple treatment "[108-pauline] from [Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft ( $ 100 ) that very morning . [She]108-pauline always meant to be kind to [every one dependent on [her]108-pauline]1781-every one dependent on her ; it was only time that lacked -- always time ! [Dependents]1782-dependents and all , [they]1782-dependents were swept away with [her]108-pauline in the same ceaseless rush . When now and then one of [them]1782-dependents dropped by the way [she]108-pauline was sorry , and sent back first aid , and did all [she]108-pauline could ; but the rush never stopped ; it could n't stop ; when [one]325-one did a kindness one could only fling it at [its]325-one object and whirl by . The blessèd peace of [the country]349-the country ! [Pauline]108-pauline drew a deep breath of content . Never before had [she]108-pauline approached [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge with so complete a sense of possessorship . [The place]2747-the place was really of [her]108-pauline own making , for though [the house]530-the house had been built and [the grounds]1787-the grounds laid out years before [she]108-pauline had acquired [the property]1788-the property , [she]108-pauline had stamped [her]108-pauline will and [her]108-pauline wealth on every feature . [Pauline]108-pauline was persuaded that [she]108-pauline was fond of [the country]349-the country -- but what [she]108-pauline was really fond of was doing things to [the country]349-the country , and owning , with this object , as many acres of [it]5-cedarledge as possible . And so it had come about that every year [the Cedarledge estate]1791-the cedarledge estate had pushed the encircling landscape farther back , and substituted for [its]1791-the cedarledge estate miles of golden - rod and birch and maple more acres of glossy lawn , and more specimen limes and oaks and cut - leaved beeches , domed over more and more windings of expensive shrubbery . From the farthest gate it was now a drive of two miles to [the house]530-the house , and [Pauline]108-pauline found even this too short for [her]108-pauline minutely detailed appreciation of what lay between [her]108-pauline and [her]108-pauline threshold . In [the village]1457-the village , the glint of the gilt weathercock on [the new half - timbered engine - house]1794-the new half - timbered engine - house ; under a rich slope of pasture - land [the recently enlarged dairy - farm]1795-the recently enlarged dairy - farm ; then [woods of hemlock and dogwood]1796-woods of hemlock and dogwood ; acres of rhododendron , azalea and mountain laurel acclimatized about [a hidden lake]1797-a hidden lake ; a glimpse of [Japanese water - gardens fringed with cherry bloom and catkins]1798-japanese water - gardens fringed with cherry bloom and catkins ; open lawns , spreading trees , [the long brick house]1799-the long brick house - front and [its]1799-the long brick house terraces , and through a sculptured archway [the Dutch garden]1800-the dutch garden with dwarf topiary work and endless files of bulbs about [the commander]1801-the commander 's baton of a stately sundial . To [Pauline]108-pauline each tree , shrub , water - course , herbaceous border , meant not only itself , but the surveying of grades , transporting of soil , tunnelling for drainage , conducting of water , the business correspondence and paying of bills , which had preceded its existence ; and [she]108-pauline would have cared for it far less -- perhaps not at all -- had it sprung into being unassisted , like the random shadbushes and wild cherry trees beyond the gates . The faint spring loveliness reached [her]108-pauline somehow , in long washes of pale green , and the blurred mauve of budding vegetation ; but [her]108-pauline eyes could not linger on any particular beauty without its dissolving into soil , manure , [nurserymen]1802-nurserymen 's catalogues , and bills again -- bills . It had all cost a terrible lot of money ; but [she]108-pauline was proud of that too -- to [her]108-pauline it was part of the beauty , part of the exquisite order and suitability which reigned as much in the simulated wildness of the rhododendron glen as in the geometrical lines of [the Dutch garden]1800-the dutch garden . " Seventy - five thousand bulbs this year ! "[108-pauline] [she]108-pauline thought , as [the motor]1016-the motor swept by [the sculptured gateway]1805-the sculptured gateway , just giving and withdrawing a flash of turf sheeted with amber and lilac , in a setting of twisted and scalloped evergreens . Twenty - five thousand more bulbs than last year ... that was how [she]108-pauline liked it to be . It was exhilarating to spend more money each year , to be always enlarging and improving , in small ways as well as great , to face unexpected demands with promptness and energy , beat down exorbitant charges , struggle through difficult moments , and come out at the end of the year tired but victorious , with improvements made , bills paid , and a reassuring balance in the bank . To [Pauline]108-pauline that was " life . "[108-pauline] And how [her]108-pauline expenditure at [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge was justifying [itself]1806-itself ! [[Her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband , drawn by its fresh loveliness , had voluntarily given up [his]556-her husband annual trip to [California]23-california , the excitement of tarpon - fishing , the independence of bachelorhood -- all to spend a quiet month in [the country]349-the country with [[his]556-her husband wife]389-his wife and [children]853-children . [Pauline]108-pauline felt that even the twenty - five thousand additional bulbs had had a part in shaping [his]556-her husband decision . And what would [he]556-her husband say when [he]556-her husband saw [the new bathrooms]1811-the new bathrooms , assisted at [the village fire - drill]1812-the village fire - drill , and plunged into [the artificially warmed waters of [the new swimming pool]1814-the new swimming pool]1813-the artificially warmed waters of the new swimming pool ? A mist of happiness rose to [her]108-pauline eyes as [she]108-pauline looked out on the spring - misted landscape . [Nona]102-nona had not followed [[her]102-nona mother]276-her mother into [the house]530-the house . [Her]276-her mother dogs at [her]276-her mother heels , [she]276-her mother plunged down hill to [the woods and lake]1817-the woods and lake . [She]276-her mother knew nothing of what [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge had cost , but little of the labour of its making . It was simply the world of [her]276-her mother childhood , and [she]276-her mother could see it from no other angle , nor imagine it as ever having been different . To [her]276-her mother it had always worn the same enchantment , stretched to the same remote distances . At nineteen it was almost the last illusion [she]276-her mother had left . In the path by [the lake]949-the lake [she]276-her mother felt [herself]276-her mother drawn back under the old spell . Those budding branches , the smell of black peaty soil quivering with life , [the woodlands]1819-the woodlands faintly starred with dogwood , all were the setting of childish adventures , old games with [Jim]110-jim , [Indian camps on [the willow - fringed island]1821-the willow - fringed island]1820-indian camps on the willow - fringed island , and innocent descents among the rhododendrons to boat or bathe by moonlight . The old skiff had escaped [Mrs. Manford]103-dexter 's annual " doing - up "[103-dexter] and still leaked through the same rusty seams . Warm enough ? Not going too fast ? The air 's still sharp up here in [the hills]3483-the hills ; "[103-dexter] and [Lita]105-lita settled down beside [him]1823-he into one of the deep silences that enfolded [her]105-lita as softly as [her]105-lita furs . "[105-lita] [She]105-lita curled down more deeply at [his]1823-he side , with a contented laugh . No doubt [she]105-lita would always be reasonable with people who knew how to treat [her]105-lita . And [he]1823-he flattered [himself]1823-he that [he]1823-he did . The day before yesterday -- just after [Pauline]108-pauline 's departure -- it had seemed as if all [their]1831-them plans would be wrecked by one of [Wyant]105-lita 's fits of crankiness . [Wyant]105-lita always enjoyed changing [his]1823-he mind after [every one else]897-every one else 's was made up ; and at the last moment [he]1823-he had telephoned to say that [he]1823-he was n't well enough to go [south]1833-south . " [[My]1823-he dear fellow]3487-my dear fellow ! Sit down , do . [Cigar]242-cigar ? Always delighted to see [[my]1823-he successor]3488-my successor . " [You]105-lita 'll like it , wo n't [you]105-lita , [Lita]105-lita ? "[1838-i] A purr of content at [his]1838-i elbow . But outside the spring dusk was secretly weaving its velvet spell . [He]1838-i said to [himself]1838-i : " Should n't wonder if [I]1838-i slept ten hours at a stretch tonight . "[1838-i] XXI THE last day before [[her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband 's arrival had been exhausting to [Pauline]108-pauline ; but [she]108-pauline could not deny that the results were worth the effort . When had [she]108-pauline ever before heard [Dexter]103-dexter say on such a full note of satisfaction : " [Jove]102-nona , but it 's good to be back ! What have [you]108-pauline done to make [the place]2747-the place look so jolly ? "[103-dexter] , or seen [his]1838-i smiling glance travel so observantly about [the big hall]1848-the big hall with [its]1848-the big hall lamps and flowers and blazing hearth ? " Well , [Lita]105-lita , this is better than [town]2627-town , eh ? [You]105-lita did n't know what [a good place]3515-a good place [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge could be ! Do n't rush off [upstairs]443-upstairs -- [they're]3517-they're bringing [the baby]378-the baby down . Come over to the fire and warm up ; it 's nipping here in [the hills]3483-the hills . [Hullo]180-hullo , [Nona]102-nona , [you]105-lita quiet mouse -- didn't even see [you]105-lita , curled up there in [your]105-lita corner ... "[1838-i] Yes ; the arrival had been perfect . Even [Lita]105-lita 's kiss had seemed spontaneous . And [Dexter]103-dexter had praised everything , noticed all the improvements ; had voluntarily announced that [he]1838-i meant to inspect the new heating system and the model chicken hatchery the next morning . " Wonderful , what a way [you]105-lita have of making things a hundred per cent better when they seemed all right before ! [I]1838-i suppose even the eggs at breakfast tomorrow will be twice [their]3520-their normal size . "[1838-i] One such comment paid [[his]1838-i wife]389-his wife for all [she]389-his wife had done , and roused [her]389-his wife inventive faculty to fresh endeavour . Was n't there something else [she]389-his wife could devise to provoke [his]1838-i praise ? And the beauty of it was that it all looked as if it had been done so easily . [The casual observer]1850-the casual observer would never have suspected that the simple life at [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge gave [its]5-cedarledge smiling organizer more trouble than a season of New [York]1-york balls . That also was part of [Pauline]108-pauline 's satisfaction . [She]108-pauline even succeeded in persuading [herself]108-pauline , as [she]108-pauline passed through [the hall]873-the hall with [its]873-the hall piled - up golf clubs and tennis rackets , its motor coats and capes and scarves stacked on the long table , and the muddy terriers comfortably rolled up on chintz - cushioned settles , that it was really all as primitive and impromptu as it looked , and that [she]108-pauline [herself]108-pauline had always shared [[her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband 's passion for stamping about in the mud in tweed and homespun . " One of these days , "[108-pauline] [she]108-pauline thought , " [we]3521-we 'll give up [New York]2-new york altogether , and live [here]2666-here all the year round , like [an old - fashioned couple]3523-an old - fashioned couple , and [Dexter]103-dexter can farm while [I]108-pauline run [the poultry - yard and dairy]3524-the poultry - yard and dairy . "[108-pauline] Instantly [her]108-pauline practical imagination outlined the plan of an up - to - date chicken - farm on a big scale , and calculated the revenues to be drawn from really scientific methods of cheese and butter - making . Spring broilers , [she]108-pauline knew , were in ever - increasing demand , and there was a great call in [restaurants]1853-restaurants and [hotels]1854-hotels for the little foreign - looking cream - cheeses in silver paper ... " [The Marchesa]114-the marchesa has rung up again , [madam]2670-madam , "[159-powder] [Powder]159-powder reminded [her]108-pauline , the second morning at breakfast . " [The Marchesa]114-the marchesa ? "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline was roused from the placid enjoyment of [her]108-pauline new - laid egg and dewy butter . Why was it that [one]325-one could never completely protect [one]325-one 's self against bores and bothers ? [They]1858-they had done everything [they]1858-they could for [Amalasuntha]117-amalasuntha , and were now discovering that gratitude may take more troublesome forms than neglect . " [The Marchesa]114-the marchesa would like to consult [you]108-pauline about the date of [the Cardinal]457-the cardinal 's reception . "[1858-they] Ah , then it was a fact -- it was really settled ! "[108-pauline] That gave [them]1858-they , at any rate , the inside of a week to [themselves]1858-they . After six days alone with [[his]1861-his women]1862-his women - kind perhaps even [Dexter]103-dexter would not be sorry for a little society ; and if so , [Pauline]108-pauline , with [the Marchesa as a bait]1863-the marchesa as a bait , could easily drum up a country - neighbour dinner . [The Toys]197-the toys , [she]108-pauline happened to remember , were to be at [the Greystock Country Club]1864-the greystock country club over [Easter]75-easter . [She]108-pauline smiled at the thought that this might have made [Dexter]103-dexter decide to give up [California]23-california for [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge . [She]108-pauline was not afraid of [Mrs. Toy]161-mrs. toy any longer , and even recognized that [her]108-pauline presence in [the neighbourhood]1865-the neighbourhood might be useful . [Pauline]108-pauline could never wholly believe -- at least not for many hours together -- that [people]437-people could be happy in [the country]349-the country without all sorts of social alleviations ; and six days of quiet seemed to [her]108-pauline measurable only in terms of prehistoric eras . When had [her]108-pauline mind ever had such a perspective to range over ? Knowing it could be shortened at will [she]108-pauline sighed contentedly , and decided to devote the morning to the study of a new refrigerating system [she]108-pauline had recently seen advertised . [Dexter]103-dexter had not yet made [his]1868-his tour of inspection with [her]108-pauline ; but that was hardly surprising . The first morning [he]1868-his had slept late , and lounged about on [the terrace]1869-the terrace in the balmy sunshine . In the afternoon [they]1870-they had all motored to [Greystock]80-greystock for a round of golf ; and today , on coming down to breakfast , [Pauline]108-pauline had learned with surprise that [[her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband , [Nona]102-nona and [Lita]105-lita were already off for an early canter , leaving word that [they]1870-they would breakfast on [the road]1872-the road . [She]108-pauline did not know whether to marvel most at [Lita]105-lita 's having been coaxed out of bed before breakfast , or at [Dexter]103-dexter 's taking to the saddle after so many years . Certainly the [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge air was wonderfully bracing and rejuvenating ; [she]108-pauline [herself]108-pauline was feeling its effects . And though [she]108-pauline would have liked to show [[her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband all the improvements [she]108-pauline felt no impatience , but only a quiet satisfaction in the success of [her]108-pauline plans . [She]108-pauline had visited [the baby]378-the baby , seen [the cook]2729-the cook , consulted with [Powder]159-powder about the working of the new burglar - alarm , gone over [the gardens]1882-the gardens , catalogues in hand , with [the head - gardener]1883-the head - gardener , walked down to [the dairy]1884-the dairy and [the poultry yard]1885-the poultry yard to say that [Mr. Manford]113-mr. manford would certainly inspect [them]1878-them both the next day , and called up [Maisie Bruss]104-maisie to ask news of [[her]104-maisie mother]276-her mother , and tell [her]104-maisie to prepare a careful list for the reception to [the Cardinal]457-the cardinal ; yet an astonishing amount of time still remained . [She]108-pauline wondered if it would not be wise to run up to [town]2627-town the next morning and consult [Amalasuntha]117-amalasuntha ; and reluctantly decided that a talk on the telephone would do . " Then [I]108-pauline suppose [you]917-her daughter and [I]108-pauline dine alone , "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline said , turning a pinched little smile on [[her]108-pauline daughter]917-her daughter . XXII WHAT a time of year it was -- the freed earth suddenly breaking into life from every frozen seam ! [Manford]103-dexter wondered if [he]1903-he had ever before had time to feel the impetuous loveliness of the American spring . In spite of [his]1903-he drive [home]2630-home in the small hours [he]1903-he had started out early the next morning for a long tramp . Sleep -- how could [a man]726-a man sleep with that April moonlight in [his]726-a man veins ? The moon that was everywhere -- caught in pearly puffs on the shadbush branches , scattered in ivory drifts of wild plum bloom , tipping the grasses of the wayside with pale pencillings , sheeting the recesses of [the woodland]1908-the woodland with pools of icy silver . A freezing burning magic , into which [a man]726-a man plunged , and came out cold and aglow , to find everything about [him]726-a man as unreal and incredible as [himself]726-a man ... After [the blatant club restaurant]1910-the blatant club restaurant , noise , jazz , [revolving couples]1911-revolving couples , Japanese lanterns , screaming laughter , tumultuous good - byes , this white silence , [the long road]1912-the long road unwinding and twisting itself up again , blind faces of [shuttered farmhouses]1913-shuttered farmhouses , [black forests]1914-black forests , [misty lakes]1915-misty lakes -- a cut through a world in sleep , all dumb and moon - bemused ... The contrast was beautiful , intolerable ... Sleep ? [He]1903-he had n't even gone to bed . Just plunged into a bath , and stretched out on [his]1903-he lounge to see the dawn come . A mysterious sight that , too ; the cold fingers of the light remaking [a new world]1916-a new world , while [men]2738-men slept , unheeding , and imagined [they]2738-men would wake to some familiar yesterday . [Fools]1918-fools ! [He]1903-he breakfasted -- ravenously -- before [[his]1903-he wife]389-his wife was down , and swung off with a couple of dogs on a long tramp , [he]1903-he did n't care where . Even [the daylight world]1920-the daylight world seemed unimaginably strange : as if [he]1903-he had never really looked at [it]1920-the daylight world before . [He]1903-he walked on slowly for three or four miles , vaguely directing [himself]1903-he toward [Greystock]80-greystock . [His]1903-he long tramps as [a boy]2999-a boy , in [his]1903-he farming days , had given [him]1903-he the habit of deliberate steady walking , and the unwonted movement refreshed rather than tired [him]1903-he -- or at least , while it tired [his]1903-he muscles , it seemed to invigorate [his]1903-he brain . Excited ? No -- just pleasantly stimulated ... [He]1903-he stretched [himself]1903-he out under a walnut tree on [a sunny slope]1922-a sunny slope , lit [his]1903-he pipe and gazed abroad over [fields and woods]1923-fields and woods . [All the land]1924-all the land was hazy with incipient life . The dogs hunted and burrowed , and then came back to doze at [his]1903-he feet with pleasant dreamings . The sun on [his]1903-he face felt warm and human , and gradually life began to settle back into its old ruts -- a comfortable routine , diversified by pleasant episodes . Could it ever be more , to [a man past fifty]1925-a man past fifty ? But after a while a chill sank on [his]1903-he spirit . [He]1903-he began to feel cold and hungry , and set out to walk again . Presently [he]1903-he found it was half - past eleven -- time to be heading for [home]2630-home . [Home]2630-home ; and the lunch - table ; [Pauline]108-pauline ; and [Nona]102-nona ; and [Lita]105-lita . Oh , God , no -- not yet ... [He]1903-he trudged on , slowly and sullenly , deciding to pick up a mouthful of lunch somewhere by the way . At a turn of [the road]1872-the road [he]1903-he caught sight of [a woman]2655-a woman 's figure strolling across [a green slope above [him]1903-he]1930-a green slope above him . Strong and erect in [her]2655-a woman trim golfing skirt , [she]2655-a woman came down in [his]1903-he direction swinging a club in [her]2655-a woman hand . Why , sure enough , [he]1903-he was actually on [the edge of [the Greystock course]1932-the greystock course]1931-the edge of the greystock course ! [The woman]871-the woman was alone , without [companions]1934-companions or [caddies]1935-caddies -- going around for a trial spin , or perhaps simply taking a stroll , as [he]1903-he was , drinking in the intoxicating air ... " Hul_lo _ ! "[871-the woman] [she]871-the woman called , and [he]1903-he found [himself]1903-he advancing toward [Gladys Toy]163-gladys toy . Was [this active erect woman in [her]2655-a woman nut - brown sweater and plaited skirt the same as the bejewelled and redundant beauty of so many wearisome dinners]1936-this active erect woman in her nut - brown sweater and plaited skirt the same as the bejewelled and redundant beauty of so many wearisome dinners ? Something of [his]1903-he old interest -- the short - lived fancy of a week or two -- revived in [him]1903-he as [she]871-the woman swung along , treading firmly but lightly on [her]871-the woman broad easy shoes . " Hul_lo _ ! "[1903-he] [he]1903-he responded . " Did n't know [you]871-the woman were [here]2666-here . "[1903-he] " [I]871-the woman was n't . [I]871-the woman only came last night . Is n't it glorious ? "[871-the woman] Even [her]871-the woman slow - dripping voice moved faster and had a livelier ring . "[1940-he] [She]1939-she was a rich armful , and [he]1940-he remembered how splendid [he]1940-he had thought plump rosy women in [his]1940-he youth , before money and fashion imposed [their]1942-their artificial standards . When [he]1940-he reëntered the doors of [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge the cold spring sunset was slanting in through [the library]952-the library windows on the tea - table at which [[his]1940-he wife]389-his wife and [Nona]102-nona sat . Of [Lita]105-lita there was no sign ; [Manford]103-dexter heard with indolent amusement that [she]105-lita was reported to be just getting up . [His]1940-he sentiment about [Lita]105-lita had settled into fatherly indulgence ; [he]1940-he no longer thought the epithet inappropriate . But underneath the superficial kindliness [he]1940-he felt for [her]105-lita , as for all [the world]303-the world , [he]1940-he was aware of a fundamental indifference to most things but [his]1940-he own comfort and convenience . Such was the salutary result of fresh air and recovered leisure . How absurd to work [one]325-one 's self into a state of fluster about this or that -- money or business or [women]1103-women ! Especially [women]1103-women . As [he]1940-he looked back on the last weeks [he]1940-he saw what a fever of fatigue [he]1940-he must have been in to take such an exaggerated view of [his]1940-he own emotions . After three days at [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge serenity had descended on [him]1940-he like a benediction . [Gladys Toy]163-gladys toy 's cheeks were as smooth as nectarines ; and the keen morning light had shown [him]1940-he that [she]105-lita was n't in the least made up . [He]1940-he recalled the fact with a certain pleasure , and then dismissed [her]105-lita from [his]1940-he mind -- or rather [she]105-lita dropped out of [herself]105-lita . [He]1940-he was n't in the humour to think long about [anybody]344-anybody or anything ... [he]1940-he revelled in [his]1940-he own laziness and indifference . " Tea ? Yes ; and a buttered muffin by all means . Several of them . [I]1940-he 'm as hungry as the devil . Went for a long tramp this morning before any of [you]3559-you were up . [Mrs. Toy]161-mrs. toy ran across [me]1940-he , and brought [me]1940-he back in [[her]161-mrs. toy new two - seater]3560-her new two - seater . A regular beauty -- [the car]3561-the car , [I]1940-he mean -- you'll have to have one like it , [Nona ... Jove]102-nona , how good the fire feels ... and what is it that smells so sweet ? Carnations -- why , they 're giants ! [We]3562-we must go over [the green - houses]3563-the green - houses tomorrow , [Pauline]108-pauline ; and all the rest of it . [I]1940-he want to take stock of all [your]108-pauline innovations . "[1940-he] At that moment [he]1940-he felt able to face even the tour of inspection , and all the facts and calculations it would evoke . Everything seemed easy now that [he]1940-he had found [he]1940-he could shake off [his]1940-he moonlight obsession by spending a few hours with [a pretty woman who did n't mind being kissed]1950-a pretty woman who did n't mind being kissed . [He]1940-he was to meet [Mrs. Toy]161-mrs. toy again the day after tomorrow ; and in the interval [she]161-mrs. toy would suffice to occupy [his]1940-he mind when [he]1940-he had nothing more interesting to think of . As [he]1940-he was putting a match to [his]1940-he pipe [Lita]105-lita came into [the room]317-the room with [her]105-lita long glide . [[Her]105-lita boy]1952-her boy was perched on [her]105-lita shoulder , and [she]105-lita looked like one of [Crivelli]246-crivelli 's enigmatic Madonnas carrying [a little red - haired Jesus]1953-a little red - haired jesus . " Gracious ! Is this breakfast or tea ? [I]105-lita seem to have overslept [myself]105-lita after [our]3564-our joy - ride , "[105-lita] [she]105-lita said , addressing a lazy smile to [Manford]103-dexter . " Kiss [[his]553-the boy granny]3565-his granny , "[105-lita] [she]105-lita commanded in [her]105-lita faintly derisive voice . Besides , [he]1955-he had always hated [women with prominent cheekbones and hollows under them]1956-women with prominent cheekbones and hollows under them . [He]1955-he settled back comfortably into the afternoon 's reminiscences . XXIII DECIDEDLY , there was a different time - measure for life in [town]2627-town and in [the country]349-the country . The dinner for [Amalasuntha]117-amalasuntha organized ( and [the Toys]197-the toys secured for it ) , there were still two days left in that endless inside of a week which was to have passed so rapidly . Yet everything had gone according to [Pauline]108-pauline 's wishes . [Dexter]103-dexter had really made the promised round of [house]1959-house and [grounds]1960-grounds , and had extended [his]1955-he inspection to [dairy]1961-dairy , [poultry yard]1962-poultry yard and [engine - house]1963-engine - house . And [he]1955-he had approved of everything -- approved almost too promptly and uncritically . Was it because [he]1955-he had not been sufficiently interested to note defects , or at any rate to point them out ? The suspicion , which stirred in [[his]1955-he wife]389-his wife when [she]389-his wife observed that [he]1955-he walked through [the cow - stables]1965-the cow - stables without making any comment on the defective working of the new ventilating system , became a certainty when , on [their]1966-their return to [the house]530-the house , [she]389-his wife suggested [their]1966-their going over the accounts together . " Oh , as long as [the architect]3462-the architect has o.k'd [them]3567-them ! Besides , it 's too late now to do anything , is n't it ? And [your]1955-he results are so splendid that [I]389-his wife do n't see how they could be overpaid . Everything seems to be perfect-- "[389-his wife] " Not the ventilating system in [[the Alderneys]3568-the alderneys ' stable]3569-the alderneys ' stable , [Dexter]103-dexter . "[389-his wife] " Oh , well ; ca n't that be arranged ? If it ca n't , put it down to profit and loss . [I]1955-he never enjoyed anything more than [my]1955-he swim this morning in [the pool]3570-the pool . [You]102-nona 've managed to get the water warmed to exactly the right temperature . "[1955-he] [He]1955-he slipped out to join [Nona]102-nona on [the putting green below [the terrace]1869-the terrace]1968-the putting green below the terrace . Yes ; everything was all right ; [he]1955-he was evidently determined that everything should be . It had been the same about [Michelangelo]182-michelangelo 's debts . At first [he]1955-he had resisted [[his]1955-he wife]389-his wife 's suggestion that [they]1971-they should help to pay [them]1971-they off , in order to escape [the young man]514-the young man 's presence in [New York]2-new york ; then [he]1955-he had suddenly promised [the Marchesa]114-the marchesa to settle the whole amount , without so much as a word to [Pauline]108-pauline . It was as if [he]1955-he were engrossed in some deep and secret purpose , and resolved to clear away whatever threatened to block [his]1955-he obstinate advance . [She]108-pauline had seen [him]1955-he thus absorbed when a " big case "[108-pauline] possessed [him]1955-he . But there were no signs now of professional preoccupation ; no telephoning , wiring , hurried arrivals of [junior members]1973-junior members or [confidential clerks]1974-confidential clerks . [He]1955-he seemed to have shaken off " [the office]2608-the office "[1955-he] with all [his]1955-he other cares . There was something about [his]1955-he serene good humour that obscurely frightened [her]108-pauline . Once [she]108-pauline might have ascribed it to an interest -- an exaggerated interest -- in [[his]1955-he step - son 's wife]1975-his step - son 's wife . That idea had already crossed [Pauline]108-pauline 's mind : [she]108-pauline remembered its cold brush on the evening when [[her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband had come [home]2630-home unexpectedly to see [her]108-pauline , and had talked so earnestly and sensibly about bringing [Lita]105-lita and [[her]105-lita boy]1952-her boy to [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge . The mere flit of a doubt -- no more ; and even then [Pauline]108-pauline had felt its preposterousness , and banished it in disgust and fear . Now [she]108-pauline smiled at the fear . [[Her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband 's manner to [Lita]105-lita was perfect -- easy , good humoured but slightly ironic . At the time of [Jim]110-jim 's marriage [Dexter]103-dexter had had that same smile . [He]556-her husband had thought [the bride]1980-the bride silly and pretentious , [he]556-her husband had even questioned [her]1980-the bride good looks . And now the first week at [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge showed that , if [his]556-her husband attitude had grown kindlier , it was for [Jim]110-jim 's sake , not [Lita]105-lita 's . [Nona]102-nona and [Lita]105-lita were together all day long ; when [Manford]103-dexter joined [them]1981-them [he]556-her husband treated [both]1982-both in the same way , as [a man]726-a man treats [two indulged and amusing daughters]1984-two indulged and amusing daughters . What was [he]556-her husband thinking of , then ? [Gladys Toy]163-gladys toy again , perhaps ? [Pauline]108-pauline had imagined that was over . Even if it were not , it no longer worried [her]108-pauline . [Dexter]103-dexter had had similar " flare - ups "[556-her husband] before , and [they]1985-they had n't lasted . Besides , [Pauline]108-pauline had gradually acquired a certain wifely philosophy , and was prepared to be more lenient to [[her]108-pauline second husband]1036-her second husband than to the first . As [wives]2907-wives grew older [they]2907-wives had to realize that [husbands]1988-husbands did n't always keep pace with [them]2907-wives ... Not that [she]108-pauline felt [herself]108-pauline too old for [Manford]103-dexter 's love ; all [her]108-pauline early illusions had rushed back to [her]108-pauline the night [he]556-her husband had made [her]108-pauline give up the [Rivington]222-mrs. rivington dinner . But [her]108-pauline dream had not survived that evening . [She]108-pauline had understood then that [he]556-her husband meant [they]1989-they should be " [only friends]2728-only friends "[556-her husband] ; that was all the future was to hold for [her]108-pauline . Well ; for [a grandmother]1990-a grandmother it ought to be enough . [She]108-pauline had no patience with [the silly old women who expected " that sort of nonsense "[108-pauline] to last]1991-the silly old women who expected " that sort of nonsense " to last . Still , [she]108-pauline meant , on [her]108-pauline return to [town]2627-town , to consult a new Russian who had invented a radium treatment which absolutely wiped out wrinkles . [He]556-her husband called [himself]556-her husband [a Scientific Initiate]1993-a scientific initiate ... the name fascinated [her]108-pauline . From these perplexities [she]108-pauline was luckily distracted by the urgent business of [the Cardinal]457-the cardinal 's reception . Even without [Maisie]104-maisie [she]108-pauline could do a good deal of preparatory writing and telephoning ; but [she]108-pauline was mortified to find how much [her]108-pauline handwriting had suffered from the long habit of dictation . [She]108-pauline never wrote a note in [her]108-pauline own hand nowadays -- except to [distinguished foreigners]2968-distinguished foreigners , since [Amalasuntha]117-amalasuntha had explained that [they]2968-distinguished foreigners thought typed communications ill - bred . And [her]108-pauline unpractised script was so stiff and yet slovenly that [she]108-pauline decided [she]108-pauline must have [her]108-pauline hands " treated "[108-pauline] as [she]108-pauline did [her]108-pauline other unemployed muscles . But how find time for this new and indispensable cure ? [Her]108-pauline spirits rose with the invigorating sense of being once more in a hurry ... [Nona]102-nona sat on [the south terrace]1996-the south terrace in the sun . [The Cedarledge]5-cedarledge experiment had lasted eight days now , and [she]102-nona had to own that it had turned out better than [she]102-nona would have thought possible . [Lita]105-lita was giving [them]2968-distinguished foreigners wonderfully little trouble . After the first flight to [Greenwich]81-greenwich [she]108-pauline had shown no desire for [cabarets]1997-cabarets and [night - clubs]1998-night - clubs , but had plunged into the alternative excitement of violent outdoor sports ; relapsing , after hours of hard exercise , into a dreamy lassitude unruffled by outward events . [She]108-pauline never spoke of [[her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband , and [Nona]102-nona did not know if [Jim]110-jim 's frequent -- too frequent -- letters , were answered , or even read . "[904-her mother - in - law] And [Pauline]108-pauline effaced [her]108-pauline blunder with a smile . [Nona]102-nona [herself]102-nona felt more and more like one of [the trench - watchers pictured in the war - time papers]2001-the trench - watchers pictured in the war - time papers . There [she]102-nona sat in the darkness on [her]102-nona narrow perch , [her]102-nona eyes glued to the observation - slit which looked out over seeming emptiness . [She]102-nona had often wondered what [those men]2002-those men thought about during the endless hours of watching , the days and weeks when nothing happened , when no faintest shadow of [a skulking enemy]2003-a skulking enemy crossed [[their]2002-those men span of [no - man]2005-no - man 's land]2004-their span of no - man 's land . What kept [them]2002-those men from falling asleep , or from losing [themselves]2002-those men in waking dreams , and failing to give warning when the attack impended ? [She]102-nona could imagine [a man]726-a man led out to be shot in the [Flanders]82-flanders mud because , at such a moment , [he]726-a man had believed [himself]726-a man to be dozing on [a daisy bank at [home]2630-home]2007-a daisy bank at home ... Since [her]102-nona talk with [Aggie Heuston]143-aggie a sort of _ curare _ had entered into [her]102-nona veins . [She]102-nona was sharply aware of everything that was going on about [her]102-nona , but [she]102-nona felt unable to rouse [herself]102-nona . Even if anything that mattered ever did happen again , [she]102-nona questioned if [she]102-nona would be able to shake off the weight of [her]102-nona indifference . Was it really ten days now since that talk with [Aggie]143-aggie ? And had everything of which [she]102-nona had then been warned fulfilled itself without [her]102-nona lifting a finger ? [She]102-nona dimly remembered having acted in what seemed a mood of heroic self - denial ; now [she]102-nona felt only as if [she]102-nona had been numb . What was the use of fine motives if , once the ardour fallen , even [they]2009-they left one in the lurch ? [She]102-nona thought : " [I]102-nona feel like [the oldest person in [the world]303-the world]3574-the oldest person in the world , and yet with the longest life ahead of [me]102-nona ... "[102-nona] and a shiver of loneliness ran over [her]102-nona . Should [she]102-nona go and hunt up [the others]772-the others ? What difference would that make ? [She]102-nona might offer to write notes for [[her]102-nona mother]276-her mother , who was [upstairs]443-upstairs plunged in [her]276-her mother visiting - list ; or look in on [Lita]105-lita , who was probably asleep after [her]105-lita hard gallop of the morning ; or find [[her]102-nona father]369-her father , and suggest going for a walk . Softly [she]102-nona pushed open the door of [one of the perfectly appointed spare - rooms]2025-one of the perfectly appointed spare - rooms : [a room so studiously equipped with every practical convenience -- from the smoothly - hung window - ventilators to the jointed dressing - table lights]2026-a room so studiously equipped with every practical convenience -- from the smoothly - hung window - ventilators to the jointed dressing - table lights , from the little portable telephone , and the bed - table with folding legs , to the tall threefold mirror which lost no curve of the beauty it reflected -- that even [Lita]105-lita 's careless ways seemed subdued to the prevailing order . [Lita]105-lita was on [the lounge]2027-the lounge , one long arm drooping , the other folded behind [her]105-lita in the immemorial attitude of sleeping beauty . Sleep lay on [her]105-lita lightly , as it does on [those who summon it at will]2028-those who summon it at will . It was [her]105-lita habitual escape from the boredom between thrills , and in such intervals of existence as [she]105-lita was now traversing [she]105-lita plunged back into it after every bout of outdoor activity . [Nona]102-nona tiptoed forward and looked down on [her]105-lita . Who said that sleep revealed [people]437-people 's true natures ? It only made [them]437-people the more enigmatic by the added veil of [its]2030-its own mystery . [Lita]105-lita 's head was nested in the angle of a thin arm , [her]105-lita lids rounded heavily above the sharp cheek - bones just swept by their golden fringe , the pale bow of the mouth relaxed , the slight steel - strong body half shown in the parting of a flowered dressing - gown . Thus exposed , with gaze extinct and loosened muscles , [she]105-lita seemed a mere bundle of contradictory whims tied together by a frail thread of beauty . The hand of the downward arm hung open , palm up . In its little hollow lay the fate of three lives . What would [she]105-lita do with [them]2031-them ? How could one conceive of [her]105-lita knowing , or planning , or imagining -- conceive of [her]105-lita in any sort of durable human relations to any one or anything ? [Her]105-lita eyes opened and a languid curiosity floated up through them . " That [you]102-nona ? [I]105-lita must have fallen asleep . What was the sense of it all ? XXIV [THE Marchesa di San Fedele]428-the marchesa di san fedele 's ideas about [the country]349-the country were perfectly simple ; in fact [she]428-the marchesa di san fedele had only one . [She]428-the marchesa di san fedele regarded [it]349-the country as a place in which there was more time to play bridge than in [town]2627-town . Thank [God]145-god for that!--and the rest one simply bore with ... Of course there was the obligatory going the rounds with [host]2052-host or [hostess]2053-hostess : [gardens]354-gardens , glass , dairy , chicken - hatchery , and heaven knew what besides ( [stables]2055-stables , thank goodness , were out of fashion -- even if [people]437-people rode [they]437-people no longer , unless [they]437-people kept hounds , dragged one between those dreary rows of box stalls , or made [one]325-one admire the lustrous steel and leather of [the harness room]2058-the harness room , or the monograms stencilled in blue and red on [the coach - house floor]2059-the coach - house floor ) . [The Marchesa]114-the marchesa 's life had always been made up of doing things as dull as going over [model dairies]2060-model dairies in order to get the chance , or the money , to do others as thrilling to [her]428-the marchesa di san fedele as dancing was to [Lita]105-lita . It was part of the game : [one]325-one had to pay for what [one]325-one got : the thing was to try and get a great deal more than the strict equivalent . " Not that [I]108-pauline do n't marvel at [your]114-the marchesa results , [Pauline]108-pauline ; [we]3599-we all do . But [they]437-people make [me]108-pauline feel so useless and incapable . All this wonderful creation -- baths and swimming - pools and [hatcheries]3600-hatcheries and fire - engines , and everything so perfect , indoors and out ! Sometimes [I]108-pauline 'm glad [you]114-the marchesa 've never been to [[our]3599-we poor old [San Fedele]71-san fedele]3601-our poor old san fedele . But of course bathrooms will have to be put in at [San Fedele]71-san fedele if [Michelangelo]182-michelangelo finds [an American bride]3602-an american bride when [he]182-michelangelo comes over ... "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline laid down the pen [she]108-pauline had taken up to record the exact terms in which [she]108-pauline was to address [[the Cardinal]457-the cardinal 's secretary]2064-the cardinal 's secretary . ( " A _ personal _ note , [dear]2609-dear ; yes , in [your]2609-dear own writing ; [they]2064-the cardinal 's secretary do n't yet understand [your]2609-dear new American ways at the Vatican ... "[108-pauline] ) " When [Michelangelo]182-michelangelo comes over ? "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline echoed . [The Marchesa]114-the marchesa 's face was sharper than a knife . "[105-lita] [She]105-lita came in quietly , almost unnoticeably , with the feathered gait that was half - way between drifting and floating ; and at once , in spite of [the twenty people assembled]2092-the twenty people assembled , had the shining parquet and all the mirrors to [herself]105-lita . [Pauline]108-pauline sat in [[her]108-pauline upstairs sitting - room]2153-her upstairs sitting - room , full of that sense of repose which comes of duties performed and rewards laid up . How could it be otherwise , at the close of a day so rich in moral satisfactions ? [She]108-pauline scanned it again , from the vantage of [her]108-pauline midnight vigil in [the sleeping house]2154-the sleeping house , and saw that all was well in [the little world]2155-the little world [she]108-pauline had created . Yes ; all was well , from the fire - drill which had given a rather languishing dinner its requisite wind - up of excitement to the arrangements for [the Cardinal]457-the cardinal 's reception , [Amalasuntha]117-amalasuntha 's skilful turning of that Birth Control obstacle , and the fact that [Jim]110-jim was philosophically remaining in [the south]3155-the south in spite of [[his]110-jim father]343-his father 's unexpected return . The only shadow on the horizon was [Michelangelo's]258-michelangelo's -- [Dexter]103-dexter would certainly be angry about that . But [she]108-pauline was not going to let [Michelangelo]182-michelangelo darken [her]108-pauline holiday , when everything else in life was so smooth and sunshiny . [The baby]378-the baby is out in the sunshine all day : [he]378-the baby 's gained nearly a pound , and is getting almost as brown as if it were summer . "[108-pauline] [Amalasuntha]117-amalasuntha tells [me]0-i [[your]2159-your father]2626-your father is back . "[2626-your father] There -- that would certainly reassure [him]2626-your father . It had reassured [her]102-nona merely to write it : given [her]102-nona the feeling , to which [she]102-nona always secretly inclined , that a thing was so if [one]325-one said it was , and doubly so if [one]325-one wrote it down . [She]102-nona sealed the letter , pushed back [her]102-nona chair , and glanced at the little clock on [her]102-nona writing - table . A quarter to two ! [She]102-nona had a right to feel sleepy , and even to curtail [her]102-nona relaxing exercises . [The country]349-the country stillness was so deep and soothing that [she]102-nona hardly needed them ... [She]102-nona opened the window , and stood drinking in the hush . The spring night was full of an underlying rustle and murmur that was a part of the silence . But suddenly a sharp sound broke on [her]102-nona -- the sound of a motor coming up [the drive]1841-the drive . In the stillness [she]102-nona caught it a long way off , probably just after [the car]3561-the car turned in at the gate . The sound was so unnatural , breaking in on the deep nocturnal dumbness of dim trees and starlit sky , that [she]102-nona drew back startled . [She]102-nona was not [a nervous woman]2167-a nervous woman , but [she]102-nona thought irritably of [a servants]2168-a servants ' escapade -- something that [the chauffeur]674-the chauffeur would have to be spoken to about the next day . Queer , though -- the motor did not turn off toward [the garage]2170-the garage . Standing in the window [she]102-nona followed its continued approach ; then heard it slow down and stop -- somewhere near [the service court]2137-the service court , [she]102-nona conjectured . Could it be that [Lita]105-lita and [Nona]102-nona had been off on one of [their]2172-their crazy trips since [the guests]970-the guests had left ? [She]102-nona must really protest at such imprudence ... [She]102-nona felt angry , nervous , uncertain . It was uncanny , hearing that invisible motor come so near [the house]530-the house and stop ... [She]102-nona hesitated a moment , and then crossed to [[her]102-nona own room]2175-her own room , opened the door of the little anteroom beyond , and stood listening at [[her]102-nona husband]556-her husband 's bedroom door . "[102-nona] No answer . [She]102-nona pronounced [his]556-her husband name again , a little louder , and then cautiously crossed the threshold and switched on the light . It was evident that [Manford]103-dexter had not been up to [[his]556-her husband room]2178-his room since [[their]2172-their guests]2179-their guests had left . It was [he]556-her husband , then , who had come back in [the motor]1016-the motor ... [She]102-nona extinguished the light and turned back into [[her]102-nona own room]2175-her own room . [She]102-nona stood wavering before the instrument . Why should n't [she]102-nona call up [Nona]102-nona , and ask-- ? Ask what ? And if it was [Dexter]103-dexter alone , then-- [She]102-nona turned from the telephone , and slowly began to undress . Presently [she]102-nona heard steps in [the hall]873-the hall , then in [the anteroom]2188-the anteroom ; then [[her]102-nona husband]556-her husband moving softly about in [[his]556-her husband own room]2190-his own room , and the unmistakable sounds of [his]556-her husband undressing ... XXVI WHEN [Nona]102-nona told [[her]102-nona mother]276-her mother that [she]102-nona wanted to go to [town]2627-town the next day to see [Mrs. Bruss]241-mrs. bruss and [Maisie]104-maisie , [Mrs. Manford]103-dexter said : " It 's only what [I]103-dexter expected of [you]102-nona , [darling]2893-darling , "[103-dexter] and added after a moment : " Do [you]102-nona think [I]103-dexter ought-- ? "[103-dexter] " No , of course not . It would simply worry [Maisie]104-maisie . "[102-nona] [Nona]102-nona knew it was the answer that [[her]102-nona mother]276-her mother awaited . [She]102-nona knew that nothing frightened and disorganized [Pauline]108-pauline as much as direct contact with physical or moral suffering -- especially physical . [Her]102-nona whole life ( if one chose to look at it from a certain angle ) had been a long uninterrupted struggle against the encroachment of every form of pain . The first step , always , was to conjure it , bribe it away , by every possible expenditure -- except of [[one]325-one 's self]2197-one 's self . Cheques , [surgeons]2198-surgeons , [nurses]2199-nurses , [private rooms in [hospitals]2201-hospitals]2200-private rooms in hospitals , X - rays , radium , whatever was most costly and up - to - date in the dreadful art of healing -- that was [her]102-nona first and strongest line of protection ; behind it came such lesser works as rest - cures , change of air , a seaside holiday , a whole new set of teeth , pink silk bed - spreads , lace cushions , stacks of picture papers , and hot - house grapes and long - stemmed roses from [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge . Behind these again were the final , the verbal defenses , made of such phrases as : " If [I]0-i thought [I]0-i could do the least good"--"If[0-i] [I]0-i did n't feel it might simply upset her"--"_Some _ [doctors]1012-doctors still consider it contagious"--with[0-i] the inevitable summing - up : " The fewer [people]437-people [she]102-nona sees the better ... "[102-nona] [Nona]102-nona knew that this attitude was not caused by lack of physical courage . Had [Pauline]108-pauline been [[a pioneer]2202-a pioneer 's wife]2203-a pioneer 's wife , and seen [[her]108-pauline family]288-her family stricken down by disease in [the wilderness]2205-the wilderness , [she]108-pauline would have nursed [them]288-her family fearlessly ; but all [her]108-pauline life [she]108-pauline had been used to buying off suffering with money , or denying its existence with words , and [her]108-pauline moral muscles had become so atrophied that only some great shock would restore [their]2206-their natural strength ... " Great shock ! [People like [mother]2638-mother]3690-people like mother never have great shocks , "[102-nona] [Nona]102-nona mused , looking at the dauntless profile , the crisply waving hair , reflected in the toilet - mirror . " Unless [I]102-nona were to give [her]108-pauline one ... "[102-nona] [she]102-nona added with an inward smile . [Mrs. Manford]103-dexter restored [her]103-dexter powder - puff to its crystal box . [They]2211-they started early , for forty - eight hours of accumulated leisure had reinforced [Pauline]108-pauline 's natural activity . [Amalasuntha]117-amalasuntha , mysteriously smiling and head - shaking over the incommunicable figures of [Klawhammer]177-klawhammer 's offer , had bustled back to [town]2627-town early on Monday , leaving [the family]2858-the family to [themselves]2858-the family -- and a certain feeling of flatness had ensued . [Dexter]103-dexter , [[his]2214-his wife]389-his wife thought , seemed secretly irritated , but determined to conceal [his]2214-his irritation from [her]389-his wife . It was about [Michelangelo]182-michelangelo , no doubt . [Lita]105-lita was silent and sleepy . [No one]425-no one seemed to have anything particular to do . [She]108-pauline certainly had nothing to worry about , and much to rejoice in , yet [she]108-pauline felt languid and vaguely apprehensive . [She]108-pauline began to wonder if [Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft 's treatment were of the lasting sort , or if it lost its efficacy , like an uncorked drug . [Mrs. Swoffer]198-mrs. swoffer 's conversation was always soothing and yet invigorating , and [Pauline]108-pauline determined to see [her]105-lita too . And there was [Arthur]107-wyant -- poor Exhibit A!--on [Jim]110-jim 's account it would be kind to look [him]107-wyant up if there were time ; unless [Nona]102-nona could manage that too , in the intervals of solacing [Maisie]104-maisie . "[2254-some invisible antagonist] [Nona]102-nona 's hand hung back from the lighting of another cigarette . " What else did [you]107-wyant try to ? "[102-nona] " What else ? "[2259-i] Act -- act -- act ! How funny it was , [Nona]102-nona reflected , as [she]102-nona remounted the hospital steps : [the people who talked most of acting]2262-the people who talked most of acting seldom did more than talk . [[Her]102-nona father]369-her father , for instance , so resolute and purposeful , never discoursed about action , but quietly went about what had to be done . Whereas poor Exhibit , perpetually inconsequent and hesitating , was never tired of formulating the most truculent plans of action for [others]2774-others . " [Poor Exhibit]3735-poor exhibit indeed -- [incorrigible amateur]3736-incorrigible amateur ! "[102-nona] [she]102-nona thought , understanding how such wordy dilettantism must have bewildered and irritated [the young and energetic [Pauline]108-pauline , fresh from the buzzing motor works at [Exploit]7-exploit]2265-the young and energetic pauline , fresh from the buzzing motor works at exploit .
