"[102-nona] [She]102-nona shot up in the lift to [the white carbolic - breathing passage]2268-the white carbolic - breathing passage where , with a heavy whiff of ether , [Mrs. Bruss]241-mrs. bruss 's door opened to receive [her]102-nona . XXVII THE restorative effect of a day away from [the country]349-the country was visible in [Pauline]108-pauline 's face and manner when [she]108-pauline dawned on the breakfast - table the next morning . The mere tone in which [she]108-pauline murmured : " How lovely it is to get back ! "[108-pauline] showed how lovely it had been to get away -- and [she]108-pauline lingered over the new - laid eggs , the golden cream , all the country freshnesses and succulences , with the sense of having richly earned [them]2270-them by a long day spent in arduous and agreeable labours . " When there are tiresome things to be done the great thing is to do them at once , "[108-pauline] [she]108-pauline announced to [Nona]102-nona across the whole - wheat toast and scrambled eggs . " [I]108-pauline simply hated to leave all this loveliness yesterday ; but how much more [I]108-pauline 'm going to enjoy it today because [I]108-pauline did ! "[108-pauline] [Her]108-pauline day in [town]2627-town had in truth been exceptionally satisfactory . All had gone well , from [her]108-pauline encounter , at [Amalasuntha 's]117-amalasuntha , with [one of [[the Cardinal]457-the cardinal 's secretaries]2274-the cardinal 's secretaries]2272-one of the cardinal 's secretaries , to the belated glimpse of [Maisie Bruss]104-maisie , haggard but hopeful on the hospital steps , receiving the hamper of fruit and flowers with grateful exclamations , and assurances that [the surgeon]2237-the surgeon was " perfectly satisfied , "[2237-the surgeon] and that there was " no reason why the dreadful thing should ever reappear . "[2237-the surgeon] In a wave of sympathetic emotion [Pauline]108-pauline had leaned from the motor to kiss [her]104-maisie and say : " [[Your]104-maisie mother]2610-your mother must have a good rest at [Atlantic City]90-atlantic city as soon as [she]2610-your mother can be moved -- [I'll]108-pauline arrange it . [Sea air]3739-sea air is such a tonic ... "[108-pauline] and [Maisie]104-maisie had thanked and wept again ... It was pleasant to be able , in a few words , to make [any one]374-any one so happy ... [She]108-pauline had found [Mrs. Swoffer]198-mrs. swoffer too ; found [her]198-mrs. swoffer in a super - terrestrial mood , beaming through inspired eye - glasses , and pouring out new torrents of stimulation . Yes : [Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft was [a great man]2277-a great man , [Mrs. Swoffer]198-mrs. swoffer said . [She]198-mrs. swoffer , for [her]198-mrs. swoffer part , had never denied it for a moment . How could [Pauline]108-pauline have imagined that [her]108-pauline faith in [Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft had failed [her]108-pauline ? No -- but there were periods of spiritual aridity which [the brightest souls]2278-the brightest souls had to traverse , and [she]108-pauline had lately had reason to suspect , from [her]108-pauline own experience and from [Pauline]108-pauline 's , that perhaps [Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft was at present engaged in such [a desert]2279-a desert . Certainly to charge a hundred dollars for a " triple treatment "[202-alvah loft] ( which was only three minutes longer than the plain one ) , and then produce no more lasting results -- well , [Mrs. Swoffer]198-mrs. swoffer preferred not to say anything uncharitable ... Then again , [she]198-mrs. swoffer sometimes suspected that [Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft 's doctrine might be only for [beginners]2280-beginners . That was what [Sacha Gobine]262-gobine , [the new Russian Initiate]2281-the new russian initiate , plainly intimated . Of course there were innumerable degrees in the spiritual life , and it might be that sometimes [[Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft 's patients]2282-alvah loft 's patients got beyond [his]202-alvah loft level -- got above it -- without [his]202-alvah loft being aware of the fact . Frankly , that was what [Gobine]262-gobine thought ( from [Mrs. Swoffer]198-mrs. swoffer 's report ) must have happened in the case of [Pauline]108-pauline . " [I]2283-the initiate believe [[your]2283-the initiate friend]3740-your friend has reached a higher plane"--that[2283-the initiate] was the way [the Initiate]2283-the initiate put it . " [She]108-pauline 's been at the gate "[202-alvah loft] ( [he]202-alvah loft called [the Mahatma]123-the mahatma and [Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft " gatekeepers "[202-alvah loft] ) , " and now the gate has opened , and [she]108-pauline has entered in -- entered into ... "[202-alvah loft] But [Mrs. Swoffer]198-mrs. swoffer said [she]198-mrs. swoffer 'd rather not try to quote [him]202-alvah loft because [she]198-mrs. swoffer could n't put it as beautifully as [he]202-alvah loft did , and [she]198-mrs. swoffer wanted [Pauline]108-pauline to hear it in [his]202-alvah loft own mystical language . " It 's eternal rejuvenation just to sit and listen to [him]202-alvah loft , "[198-mrs. swoffer] [she]198-mrs. swoffer breathed , laying an electric touch on [[her]198-mrs. swoffer visitor]1475-her visitor 's hand . Rejuvenation ! The word dashed itself like cool spray against [Pauline]108-pauline 's strained nerves and parched complexion . [She]108-pauline could never hear it without longing to plunge deep into its healing waters . Between manicure and hair - waver [she]108-pauline was determined to squeeze in a moment with [Gobine]262-gobine . And the encounter , as [she]108-pauline told [Nona]102-nona , had been like " a religious experience"--apparently[108-pauline] forgetful of the fact that every other meeting with [a new prophet]2285-a new prophet had presented itself to [her]108-pauline in identical terms . " [You]108-pauline see , [[my]108-pauline dear]2629-my dear , it 's something so entirely new , so completely different ... so emotional ; yes , emotional ; that 's the word . [The Russians]263-the russians , of course , are emotional ; it 's [their]263-the russians peculiar quality . [Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft -- and [you]108-pauline understand that [I]108-pauline do n't in the least suggest any loss of faith in [him]202-alvah loft ; but [Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft has a mind which speaks to the _ mind _ ; there is no appeal to the feelings . Whereas in [Gobine]262-gobine 's teaching there is a mystic strain , a kind of Immediacy , as [Mrs. Swoffer]198-mrs. swoffer calls it ... Immediacy ... "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline lingered on the term . It captivated [her]108-pauline , as any word did when [she]108-pauline first heard it used in a new connection . " [I]2286-i do n't know how [one]325-one could define the sensation better . ' Soul - unveiling ' is [Gobine]262-gobine 's expression ... But [he]202-alvah loft insists on time , on plenty of time ... [He]202-alvah loft says [we]3743-we are all parching [our]3743-we souls by too much hurry . Of course [I]2286-i always felt that with [Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft . [I]2286-i felt like one of those cash - boxes [they]3744-they shoot along over [your]108-pauline head in [the department stores]3745-the department stores . Number one , number two , and so on -- always [somebody]2883-somebody treading on [your]108-pauline heels . Whereas [Gobine]262-gobine absolutely refuses to be hurried . Sometimes [he]202-alvah loft sees [only one patient]3747-only one patient a day . When [I]2286-i left [him]202-alvah loft [he]202-alvah loft told [me]2286-i [he]202-alvah loft thought [he]202-alvah loft would not see [any one else]3748-any one else till the next morning . ' [I]2286-i do n't want to mingle [your]2286-i soul with any other . ' Rather beautiful , was n't it ? And [he]202-alvah loft does give [one]325-one a wonderful dreamy sense of rest ... "[2286-i] [She]2286-i closed [her]2286-i eyes and leaned back , evoking the gaunt bearded face and heavy - lidded eyes of [the new prophet]2287-the new prophet , and the moist adhesive palm [he]2287-the new prophet had laid in benediction on [her]2286-i forehead . How different from the thick - lipped oily [Mahatma]123-the mahatma , and from the thin dry [Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft , who seemed more like an implement in [a laboratory]2288-a laboratory than [a human being]2289-a human being ! " Perhaps one needs [them]3750-them all in turn , "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline murmured half - aloud , with the self - indulgence of [the woman who has never had to do over an out - of - fashion garment]2290-the woman who has never had to do over an out - of - fashion garment . " [One]325-one ought to be able to pass on last year 's healers to [one]325-one 's poor relations , ought n't one , [mother]2638-mother ? "[102-nona] [Nona]102-nona softly mocked ; but [[her]102-nona mother]276-her mother disarmed [her]102-nona with an unresentful smile . " [Darling]2893-darling ! There -- [you]2893-darling do n't mind [[your]2893-darling old mother]3427-your old mother 's just suggesting it ? "[102-nona] [Really Nona]102-nona worried [her]276-her mother at times -- or would , if [Gobine]262-gobine had n't shed over [her]276-her mother this perfumed veil of Peace . Yes -- Peace : that was what [she]276-her mother had always needed . Perfect confidence that everything would always come right in the end . Of course [the other healers]2292-the other healers had taught that too ; [some people]3426-some people might say that [[Gobine]262-gobine 's evangel]2294-gobine 's evangel was only the [Mahatma]123-the mahatma 's doctrine of the Higher Harmony . But the resemblance was merely superficial , as [the Scientific Initiate]2295-the scientific initiate had been careful to explain to [her]276-her mother . [[Her]276-her mother previous guides]2296-her previous guides had not been [Initiates]2297-initiates , and had no scientific training ; [they]2296-her previous guides could only guess , whereas [he]2295-the scientific initiate _ knew _ . That was the meaning of Immediacy : direct contact with [the Soul of the Invisible]2298-the soul of the invisible . How clear and beautiful [he]2295-the scientific initiate made it all ! How all the little daily problems shrivelled up and vanished like a puff of smoke to eyes cleared by that initiation ! And [he]2295-the scientific initiate had seen at once that [Pauline]108-pauline was one of [the few who _ could _ be initiated]2299-the few who _ could _ be initiated ; who were worthy to be drawn out of the senseless modern rush and taken in [Beyond the Veil]91-beyond the veil . [She]276-her mother closed [her]276-her mother eyes again , and felt [herself]276-her mother there with [him]2295-the scientific initiate ... " Of course [he]2295-the scientific initiate treats hardly [anybody]344-anybody , "[276-her mother] [Mrs. Swoffer]198-mrs. swoffer had assured [her]276-her mother ; " [not one in a hundred]3758-not one in a hundred . [He]2295-the scientific initiate says [he]2295-the scientific initiate 'd rather starve than waste [his]2295-the scientific initiate time on the unmystical . ( [He]2295-the scientific initiate saw at once that [you]276-her mother were mystical . ) Because [he]2295-the scientific initiate takes time -- [he]2295-the scientific initiate must have it ... Days , weeks , if necessary . [Our]3759-our crowded engagements mean nothing to [him]2295-the scientific initiate . [He]2295-the scientific initiate wo n't have a clock in [the house]530-the house . And [he]2295-the scientific initiate does n't care whether [he]2295-the scientific initiate 's paid or not ; [he]2295-the scientific initiate says [he]2295-the scientific initiate 's paid in soul - growth . Marvellous , is n't it ? "[276-her mother] Marvellous indeed ! And how different from [Alvah Loft]202-alvah loft 's Taylorized treatments , [his]202-alvah loft rapidly rising scale of charges , and the unbroken stream of [patients]1266-patients succeeding each other under [his]202-alvah loft bony touch ! And how [one]325-one came back from communion with the Invisible longing to help [others]2774-others , to draw [all one 's dear ones]2303-all one 's dear ones with [one Beyond the Veil]2304-one beyond the veil . [Pauline]108-pauline had gone to [town]2627-town with an unavowed burden on [her]108-pauline mind . [Jim]110-jim , [Lita]105-lita , [[her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband , [that blundering Amalasuntha]2307-that blundering amalasuntha , that everlasting [Michelangelo]182-michelangelo ; and [Nona]102-nona , too -- [Nona , who looked thinner and more drawn every day , and whose tongue seemed to grow sharper and more derisive]2308-nona , who looked thinner and more drawn every day , and whose tongue seemed to grow sharper and more derisive ; who seemed -- at barely twenty -- to be turning from [a gay mocking girl]2309-a gay mocking girl into [a pinched fault - finding old maid]2310-a pinched fault - finding old maid ... All these things had weighed on [Pauline]108-pauline more than [she]108-pauline cared to acknowledge ; but now [she]108-pauline felt strong enough to lift them , or rather they had become as light as air . " If only [[you]3761-you Americans]3762-you americans would persuade [yourselves]3761-you of the utter unimportance of the Actual -- of the total non - existence of the Real . "[262-gobine] That was what [Gobine]262-gobine had said , and the words had thrilled [her]108-pauline like a revelation . [Her]108-pauline eyes continued to rest with an absent smile on [[her]108-pauline daughter]917-her daughter 's ironic face , but what [she]108-pauline was really thinking of was : " How on earth can [I]108-pauline possibly induce [him]3763-him to come to [the Cardinal]457-the cardinal 's reception ? "[108-pauline] That was one of the things that [Nona]102-nona would never understand [her]108-pauline caring about . [She]108-pauline would credit -- didn't [[Pauline]108-pauline know!--her mother with the fatuous ambition to use [[her]2312-pauline know!--her mother with the fatuous ambition to use her united celebrities united celebrities]2313-her united celebrities]2312-pauline know!--her mother with the fatuous ambition to use her united celebrities for a social " draw , "[108-pauline] as [a selfish child]2314-a selfish child might gather all its toys into one heap ; [she]108-pauline would never see how important it was to bring together [the representatives of the conflicting creeds]2315-the representatives of the conflicting creeds , [the bearers of the multiple messages]2316-the bearers of the multiple messages , in the hope of drawing from [their]2315-the representatives of the conflicting creeds contact the flash of revelation for which the whole creation groaned . " If only [the Cardinal]457-the cardinal could have a quiet talk with [Gobine]262-gobine , "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline thought ; and , immediately dramatizing the possibility , saw [herself]108-pauline steering [his]2317-his Eminence toward the innermost recess of [[her]108-pauline long suite of drawing - rooms]2318-her long suite of drawing - rooms , where [the Scientific Initiate , shaggy but inspired]2319-the scientific initiate , shaggy but inspired , would suddenly stand before [the Prince of [the Church]442-the church]441-the prince of the church while [she]108-pauline guarded the threshold from [intruders]2322-intruders . What new life it might put into the ossified Roman dogmas if [the Cardinal]457-the cardinal could be made to understand that beautiful new doctrine of Immediacy ! But how could [she]108-pauline ever persuade [Gobine]262-gobine to kiss the ring ? " And [Mrs. Bruss]241-mrs. bruss -- any news ? [I]108-pauline thought [Maisie]104-maisie seemed really hopeful . "[108-pauline] " Yes ; the night was n't bad . [The doctors]1891-the doctors think [she]104-maisie 'll go on all right -- for the present . "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline frowned ; it was distasteful to have the suggestion of suffering and decay obtruded upon [her]108-pauline beatific mood . [She]108-pauline was living in a world where such things were not , and it seemed cruel -- and unnecessary -- to suggest to [her]108-pauline that perhaps all [Mrs. Bruss]241-mrs. bruss had already endured might not avail to spare [her]108-pauline future misery . " [I]241-mrs. bruss 'm sure [we]3767-we ought to try to resist looking ahead , and creating imaginary suffering for [ourselves]3767-we or [others]2774-others . Why should [the doctors]1891-the doctors say ' for the present ' ? [They]1891-the doctors ca n't possibly tell if the disease will ever come back . "[241-mrs. bruss] " No ; but [they]1891-the doctors know it generally does . "[102-nona] " Ca n't [you]102-nona see , [Nona]102-nona , that that 's just what _ makes _ it ? Being prepared to suffer is really the way to create suffering . And creating suffering is creating sin , because sin and suffering are really one . [We]3767-we ought to refuse [ourselves]3767-we to pain . [All the great Healers]3770-all the great healers have taught [us]3767-we that . "[102-nona] [Nona]102-nona lifted [her]102-nona eyebrows in the slightly disturbing way [she]102-nona had . " Did [Christ]264-christ ? "[102-nona] [Pauline]108-pauline felt [her]108-pauline colour rise . This habit of irrelevant and rather impertinent retort was growing on [Nona]102-nona . The idea of stirring up the troublesome mysteries of Christian dogma at the breakfast - table ! [Pauline]108-pauline had no intention of attacking any religion . But [Nona]102-nona was really getting as querulous as [a teething child]2324-a teething child . Perhaps that was what [she]102-nona was , morally ; perhaps some new experience was forcing its way through the tender flesh of [her]102-nona soul . The suggestion was disturbing to all [Pauline]108-pauline 's theories ; yet confronted with [[her]108-pauline daughter]917-her daughter 's face and voice [she]108-pauline could only take refuge in the idea that [Nona]102-nona , unable to attain the Higher Harmony , was struggling in a crepuscular wretchedness from which [she]102-nona refused to be freed . " If [you]102-nona 'd only come to [Gobine]262-gobine with [me]102-nona , [dear]2609-dear , these problems would never trouble [you]102-nona any more . "[102-nona] " [They]3772-they do n't now -- not an atom . What troubles [me]108-pauline is the plain human tangle , as it remains after [we]3773-we 've done [our]3773-we best to straighten it out . Look at [Mrs. Bruss]241-mrs. bruss ! "[108-pauline] " But [the doctors]1891-the doctors say there 's every chance-- "[102-nona] " Did [you]108-pauline ever know [them]1891-the doctors not to , after a first operation for cancer ? "[102-nona] " Of course , [Nona]102-nona , if [you]102-nona take sorrow and suffering for granted-- "[108-pauline] " [I]108-pauline do n't , [mother]2638-mother ; but , apparently , [Somebody]2883-somebody does , judging from [their]2883-somebody diffusion and persistency , as the natural history books say . "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline felt [her]108-pauline smooth brows gather in an unwelcome frown . [The child]1543-the child had succeeded in spoiling [her]108-pauline breakfast and in unsettling the happy equilibrium which [she]108-pauline had imparted to [[her]108-pauline world]790-her world . [She]108-pauline did n't know what ailed [Nona]102-nona , unless [she]108-pauline was fretting over [Stan Heuston]137-heuston 's disgraceful behaviour ; but if so , it was better that [she]108-pauline should learn in time what [he]137-heuston was , and face [her]108-pauline disillusionment . [She]108-pauline might actually have ended by falling in love with [him]137-heuston , [Pauline]108-pauline reflected , and that would have been very disagreeable on account of [Aggie]143-aggie . " What [she]108-pauline needs is to marry , "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline said to [herself]108-pauline , struggling back to serenity . [She]108-pauline glanced at [her]108-pauline watch , wondered if it were worth while to wait any longer for [[her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband , and decided to instruct [Powder]159-powder to keep [his]556-her husband breakfast hot , and produce fresh coffee and rice - cakes when [he]556-her husband rang . [Dexter]103-dexter , the day before , had taken [Lita]105-lita off on another long excursion . [They]2329-them had turned up so late that dinner had to be postponed for [them]2329-them , and had been so silent and remote all the evening that [Pauline]108-pauline had ventured a jest on the soporific effects of country air , and suggested that [every one]1005-every one should go to bed early . This morning , though it was past ten o'clock , neither of [the two]394-the two had appeared ; and [Nona]102-nona declared [herself]102-nona ignorant of [their]2329-them plans for the day . " It 's a mercy [Lita]105-lita is so satisfied here , "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline sighed , resigning [herself]108-pauline to another dull day at the thought of the miracle [Manford]103-dexter was accomplishing . [She]108-pauline had felt rather nervous when [Amalasuntha]117-amalasuntha had appeared with [her]117-amalasuntha incredible film stories , and [her]117-amalasuntha braggings about the irresistible [Michelangelo]182-michelangelo ; but [Lita]105-lita did not seem to have been unsettled by [them]2329-them . " [Jim]110-jim will have a good deal to be grateful for when [he]110-jim gets [home]2630-home , "[105-lita] [Pauline]108-pauline smiled to [[her]108-pauline daughter]917-her daughter . By the way , "[108-pauline] [she]108-pauline added , with another smile , " [I]108-pauline did n't tell [you]102-nona , did [I]108-pauline , that [I]108-pauline ran across [Arthur]107-wyant yesterday ? "[108-pauline] [Nona]102-nona hesitated a moment . " So did [I.]102-nona "[102-nona] " Oh , did [you]102-nona ? [He]110-jim did n't mention it . "[108-pauline] " It 's just as well [you]108-pauline did n't , after such a tiring day . "[102-nona] " [He]110-jim was so persistent -- [you]108-pauline know how [he]110-jim is at times . "[102-nona] [Nona]102-nona gave an impatient shrug . " How absurd ! But of course [he]110-jim wo n't . [I]102-nona do n't exactly see [dear old Exhibit]136-exhibit walking up to the front door of [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge . "[102-nona] [Pauline]108-pauline 's colour rose again ; [she]108-pauline too had pictured the same possibility , only to reject it . [Wyant]107-wyant had always refused to cross [her]108-pauline threshold in [New York]2-new york , though [she]108-pauline lived in [a house bought after [her]108-pauline second marriage]2333-a house bought after her second marriage ; surely [he]107-wyant would be still more reluctant to enter [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge , where [he]107-wyant and [she]108-pauline had spent [their]2334-their early life together , and [[their]2334-their son]2335-their son had been born . There were certain things , as [he]107-wyant was always saying , that [a man]726-a man did n't do : that was all . [Nona]102-nona was still pondering . " [I]102-nona would n't go to [town]2627-town to see [him]107-wyant , [mother]2638-mother ; why should [you]2638-mother ? [He]107-wyant was excited , and rather cross , yesterday , but [he]107-wyant really had n't anything to say . [He]107-wyant just wanted to hear [himself]107-wyant talk . "[102-nona] " Thank [you]2638-mother , [dear]2609-dear . [I]1543-the child wish [you]2638-mother would . "[1543-the child] How sensible [the child]1543-the child could be when [she]1543-the child chose ! [Her]1543-the child answer chimed exactly with [[her]1543-the child mother]276-her mother 's secret inclination , and [the latter]279-the latter , rising from the breakfast - table , decided to slip away to a final revision of [the Cardinal]457-the cardinal 's list . It was pleasant , for once , to have time to give so important a matter all the attention it deserved . XXVIII WHEN [Nona]102-nona came down the next morning it was raining -- a cold blustery rain , lashing the branches about and driving the startled spring back into its secret recesses . It was the first rain since [their]2341-their arrival at [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge , and it seemed to thrust [them]2341-their back also -- back into [the wintry world of [town]2627-town]2342-the wintry world of town , of [dripping streets]2344-dripping streets , early lamplight and crowded places of amusement . [Mrs. Manford]103-dexter had already breakfasted and left [the dining - room]562-the dining - room , but [[her]103-dexter husband]556-her husband 's plate was still untouched . [He]556-her husband came in as [Nona]102-nona was finishing , and after an absent - minded nod and smile dropped silently into [[his]556-her husband place]2347-his place . [He]556-her husband sat opposite the tall rain - striped windows , and as [he]556-her husband stared out into the grayness it seemed as if some of it , penetrating into [the room]317-the room in spite of the red sparkle of the fire , had tinged [his]556-her husband face and hair . Lately [Nona]102-nona had been struck by [his]556-her husband ruddiness , and the vigour of the dark waves crisping about [his]556-her husband yellow - brown temples ; but now [he]556-her husband had turned sallow and autumnal . " What [people]437-people call [looking one]3786-looking one 's age , [I]556-her husband suppose -- as if [we]3787-we did n't have a dozen or a hundred ages , [all of [us]3787-we]3788-all of us ! "[556-her husband] [[Her]102-nona father]369-her father had withdrawn [his]369-her father stare from [the outer world]2350-the outer world and turned it toward the morning paper on the book - stand beside [his]369-her father plate . With lids lowered and fixed lips [he]556-her husband looked strangely different again -- rather like [his]556-her husband own memorial bust in bronze . [She]102-nona shivered a little ... " [Father]166-father ! [Your]369-her father coffee 's getting cold . "[102-nona] [He]369-her father pushed aside the paper , glanced at the letters piled by [his]369-her father plate , and lifted [his]369-her father eyes to [Nona]102-nona 's . The twinkle [she]102-nona always woke seemed to struggle up to [her]102-nona from a long way off . " [I]369-her father missed [my]369-her father early tramp and do n't feel particularly enthusiastic about breakfast . "[369-her father] " It 's not enthusiastic weather . "[2351-they] " No . "[369-her father] [He]369-her father had grown absent - minded again . " Pity ; when [we]2351-they 've so few days left . "[369-her father] " It may clear , though . "[2351-they] What stupid things [they]2351-they were saying ! Much either [he]2352-he or [she]2353-she cared about the weather , when [they]2351-they were in [the country]349-the country and had the prospect of a good tramp or a hard gallop together . Not that [they]2351-they had had many such lately ; but then [she]102-nona had been busy with [[her]102-nona mother]276-her mother , trying to make up for [Maisie]104-maisie 's absence ; and there had been the interruption caused by the week - end party ; and [he]369-her father had been helping to keep [Lita]105-lita amused -- with success , apparently . " Yes ... [I]369-her father should n't wonder if it cleared . "[369-her father] [He]369-her father frowned out toward the sky again . " Round about midday . "[369-her father] [He]369-her father paused , and added : " [I]369-her father thought of running [Lita]105-lita over to [Greystock]80-greystock . "[369-her father] [She]102-nona nodded . [They]2351-they would no doubt stay and dine , and [Lita]105-lita would get [her]105-lita dance . Probably [Mrs. Manford]103-dexter would n't mind , though [she]103-dexter was beginning to show signs of wearying of tête - à - tête dinners with [[her]103-dexter daughter]917-her daughter . But [they]2351-they could go over the reception list again ; and [Pauline]108-pauline could talk about [her]108-pauline new Messiah . [Nona]102-nona glanced down at [her]102-nona own letters . [She]102-nona often forgot to look at them till the day was nearly over , now that [she]102-nona knew the one writing [her]102-nona eyes thirsted for would not be on any of the envelopes . [Stanley Heuston]137-heuston had made no sign since [they]2351-they had parted that night on the doorstep ... The door opened , and [Lita]105-lita came in . It was the first time since [their]2351-they arrival that [she]105-lita had appeared at breakfast . [She]105-lita faced [Manford]103-dexter as [she]105-lita entered , and [Nona]102-nona saw [[her]102-nona father]369-her father 's expression change . It was like those funny old portraits in [the picture - restorers]2358-the picture - restorers ' windows , with a veil of age and dust removed from one half to show the real surface underneath . [Lita]105-lita 's entrance did not make [him]369-her father look either younger or happier ; it simply removed from [his]369-her father face the soul - disguising veil which life interposes between [a man]726-a man 's daily world and [himself]369-her father . [He]369-her father looked stripped -- exposed ... exposed ... that was it . [Nona]102-nona glanced at [Lita]105-lita , not to surprise [her]102-nona off [her]102-nona guard , but simply to look away from [[her]102-nona father]369-her father . [Lita]105-lita 's face was what it always was : something so complete and accomplished that [one]325-one could not imagine its being altered by any interior disturbance . It was like a delicate porcelain vase , or a smooth heavy flower , that a shifting of light might affect , but nothing from within would alter . [She]105-lita smiled in [her]105-lita round - eyed unseeing way , as [a little gold - and - ivory goddess]2362-a little gold - and - ivory goddess might smile down on [[her]2362-a little gold - and - ivory goddess worshippers]2363-her worshippers , and said : " [I]105-lita got up early because there was n't any need to . "[105-lita] The reason was one completely satisfying to [herself]105-lita , but its effect on [[her]105-lita hearers]2364-her hearers was perhaps disappointing . [Nona]102-nona made no comment , and [Manford]103-dexter merely laughed -- a vague laugh addressed , one could see , less to [her]105-lita words , which [he]369-her father appeared not to have noticed , than to the mere luminous fact of [her]105-lita presence ; the kind of laugh evoked by the sight of a dazzling fringed fish or flower suddenly offered to [one]325-one 's admiration . " [I]369-her father think the rain will hold off before lunch , "[369-her father] [he]369-her father said , communicating the fact impartially to [the room]317-the room . " Oh , what a pity -- [I]105-lita wanted to get [my]105-lita hair thoroughly drenched . It 's beginning to uncurl with the long drought , "[105-lita] [Lita]105-lita said , [her]105-lita hand wavering uncertainly between the dishes [Powder]159-powder had placed in front of [her]105-lita . " Grape - fruit , [I]105-lita think -- though it 's so awfully ocean - voyagy . Promise [me]105-lita , [Nona--]217-nona-- ! "[105-lita] [She]105-lita turned to [[her]105-lita sister - in - law]331-her sister - in - law . " Promise [you]331-her sister - in - law what ? " [I]369-her father 'll order [the car]3561-the car at eleven , "[369-her father] [he]369-her father said , in a tone of aimless severity . [Lita]105-lita was scooping a spoonful of juice out of the golden bowl of the grape - fruit . [She]105-lita seemed neither to heed nor to hear . [Her]105-lita gold - fringed lids fluttered a little , as if the fruit - juice were a kiss . " When are [you]105-lita sailing ? "[102-nona] [Nona]102-nona asked , reaching for the cigarette - lighter . " Do n't know . Next week , [I]102-nona should n't wonder . "[102-nona] " For [any particular part of [the globe]2882-the globe]3790-any particular part of the globe ? "[105-lita] [Lita]105-lita 's head descended , and [she]105-lita turned [her]105-lita chestnut - coloured eyes softly on [[her]105-lita sister - in - law]331-her sister - in - law . " Yes ; but [I]105-lita ca n't remember what it 's called . "[105-lita] [Nona]102-nona was looking at [her]105-lita in silence . It was simply that [she]105-lita was so beautiful . A vase ? No -- a lamp now : there was a glow from the interior . As if [her]105-lita red corpuscles had turned into millions of fairy lamps ... [Her]105-lita glance left [Nona]102-nona 's and returned to [her]105-lita plate . " Letters . What a bore ! Why on earth do n't [people]437-people telephone ? "[105-lita] [She]105-lita did not often receive letters , [her]105-lita congenital inability to answer them having gradually cooled the zeal of [[her]105-lita correspondents]2370-her correspondents ; of all , that is , excepting [[her]105-lita husband]556-her husband . Almost every day [Nona]102-nona saw one of [Jim]110-jim 's gray - blue envelopes on the hall table . That particular colour had come to symbolize to [her]105-lita a state of patient expectancy . [Lita]105-lita was turning over some impersonal looking bills and advertisements . From beneath [them]2372-them the faithful gray - blue envelope emerged . [Nona]102-nona thought : " If only [he]110-jim wouldn't-- ! "[102-nona] and [her]102-nona eyes filled . [Lita]105-lita looked pensively at the post - mark and then laid the envelope down unopened . " Are n't [you]102-nona going to read [your]102-nona letter ? "[105-lita] [She]105-lita raised [her]105-lita brows . " [Jim]110-jim 's ? [I]105-lita did -- yesterday . One just like it . "[105-lita] " [Lita]105-lita ! [You're]105-lita -- [you're]105-lita perfectly beastly ! "[105-lita] [Lita]105-lita 's languid mouth rounded into a smile . Don't -- not like that ! "[105-lita] It made [Nona]102-nona wince . " [I]299-the girl wish [she]102-nona _ hated _ [Jim]110-jim -- [I]299-the girl wish [she]102-nona wanted to kill [him]110-jim ! "[102-nona] [Nona]102-nona stood motionless , staring out of the window . [She]102-nona saw [[her]102-nona father]369-her father drive up in [the Buick]2219-the buick . The rain had diminished to a silver drizzle shot with bursts of sun , and through the open window [she]102-nona heard [him]369-her father call : " It 's going to clear after all . [We]2377-they 'd better start . "[369-her father] [Lita]105-lita went out of the door , humming a tune . " [Lita]105-lita ! "[102-nona] [Nona]102-nona called out , moved by some impulse to arrest , to warn -- [she]102-nona did n't know what . But the door had closed , and [Lita]105-lita was already out of hearing . All through the day it kept on raining at uncomfortable intervals . Uncomfortable , that is , for [Pauline]108-pauline and [Nona]102-nona . Whenever [they]2377-they tried to get out for a walk a deluge descended ; then , as soon as [they]2377-they had splashed back to [the house]530-the house with the dripping dogs , the clouds broke and mocked [them]2377-they with a blaze of sunshine . But by that time [they]2377-they were either revising the list again , or had settled down to [Mah]265-mah - jongg in [the library]952-the library . " Really , [I]108-pauline ca n't go up and change into [my]108-pauline walking shoes _ again _ ! "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline remonstrated to the weather ; and a few minutes later the streaming window - panes had justified [her]108-pauline . " April showers , "[108-pauline] [she]108-pauline remarked with a slightly rigid smile . [She]108-pauline looked deprecatingly at [[her]108-pauline daughter]917-her daughter . " It was selfish of [me]108-pauline to keep [you]917-her daughter [here]2666-here , [dear]2609-dear . " Well , [I]108-pauline fancy [we]3802-we shall have them back for tea . " No ; but [Lita]105-lita may want to stay and dance . "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline made no comment , but once more addressed [her]108-pauline disciplined attention to the game . The fire , punctually replenished , continued to crackle and drowse . The warmth drew out the strong scent of the carnations and rose - geraniums , and made [the room]317-the room as languid as [a summer garden]2382-a summer garden . Dusk fell from the cloud - laden skies , and in due course the hand which tended the fire drew the curtains on their noiseless rings and lit the lamps . [Lastly Powder]159-powder appeared , heading the processional entrance of the tea - table . [Pauline]108-pauline roused [herself]108-pauline from a languishing Mah - jongg to take [her]108-pauline expected part in the performance . [She]108-pauline and [Nona]102-nona grouped [themselves]2383-themselves about the hearth , and [Pauline]108-pauline lifted the lids of the little covered dishes with a critical air . " [I]108-pauline ordered those muffins [[your]108-pauline father]2626-your father likes so much , "[108-pauline] [she]108-pauline said , in a tone of unwonted wistfulness . " Perhaps [we]2383-themselves 'd better send them out to be kept hot . "[108-pauline] [Nona]102-nona agreed that it would be better ; but as [she]102-nona had [her]102-nona hand on the bell the sound of an approaching motor checked [her]102-nona . The dogs woke with a happy growling and bustled out . " There [they]3804-they are after all ! "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline said . There was a minute or two of silence , unmarked by the usual yaps of welcome ; then a sound like the depositing of wraps and an umbrella ; then [Powder]159-powder on the threshold , for once embarrassed and at a loss . " [Mr. Wyant]107-wyant , [madam]2670-madam . "[159-powder] " [Mr. Wyant]107-wyant ? "[159-powder] " [Mr. Arthur Wyant]107-wyant . [He]107-wyant seemed to think [you]103-dexter were probably expecting [him]107-wyant , "[159-powder] [Powder]159-powder continued , as if lengthening the communication in order to give [her]108-pauline time . [Mrs. Manford]103-dexter , seizing it , rose to the occasion with one of [her]103-dexter heroic wing - beats . " Yes -- [I]103-dexter was . "[102-nona] Yes ; it was all over and done with ; and [Pauline]108-pauline felt that [she]108-pauline had a right to congratulate [herself]108-pauline . [She]108-pauline had not told [Nona]102-nona how " difficult "[108-pauline] [Wyant]105-lita had been for the first few minutes , when [the girl]299-the girl had slipped out of [the library]952-the library after tea and left [them]2401-them alone . What was the use of going into all that ? [Pauline]108-pauline had been a little nervous at first -- worried , for instance , as to what might happen if [Dexter]103-dexter and [Lita]105-lita should walk in while [Arthur]126-arthur was in that queer excited state , stamping up and down [the library floor]2402-the library floor , and muttering , half to [himself]126-arthur and half to [her]108-pauline : " Damn it , am [I]126-arthur in [[my]126-arthur own house]3860-my own house or [another man]3861-another man 's ? Can [anybody]344-anybody answer [me]126-arthur that ? "[126-arthur] But [they]2401-them had not walked in , and the phase of excitability had soon been over . [Pauline]108-pauline had only had to answer : " [You]126-arthur 're in [[my]108-pauline house]3863-my house , [Arthur]126-arthur , where , as [[Jim]110-jim 's father]3864-jim 's father , [you]126-arthur 're always welcome ... "[108-pauline] That had put a stop to [his]126-arthur ravings , shamed [him]126-arthur a little , and so brought [him]126-arthur back to [his]126-arthur sense of what was due to the occasion , and to [his]126-arthur own dignity . " [[My]2403-her dear]2629-my dear -- [you]2629-my dear must excuse [me]2403-her . [I]2403-her 'm only [an intruder]3866-an intruder [here]2666-here , [I]2403-her know-- "[2403-her] And when [she]2403-her had added : " Never in [[my]2403-her house]3863-my house , [Arthur]126-arthur . Sit down , please , and tell [me]2403-her what [you]126-arthur want to see [me]2403-her about-- "[2403-her] why , at that question , quietly and reasonably put , all [his]126-arthur bluster had dropped , and [he]126-arthur had sat down as [she]2403-her bade [him]126-arthur , and begun , in [his]126-arthur ordinary tone , to rehearse the old rigmarole about [Jim]110-jim and [Lita]105-lita , and [Jim]110-jim 's supineness , and [Lita]105-lita 's philanderings , and what would the end of it be , and did [she]2403-her realize that [the woman]871-the woman was making a laughing - stock of [[their]2405-their son]2335-their son -- yes , that [they]2405-their were talking about it at [the clubs]2407-the clubs ? After that [she]2403-her had had no trouble . It had been easy to throw a little gentle ridicule over [his]126-arthur apprehensions , and then to reassure [him]126-arthur by [her]2403-her report of [her]2403-her own talk with [Lita]105-lita ( though [she]2403-her winced even now at its conclusion ) , and the affirmation that the Cedarledge experiment had been entirely successful . Then , luckily , just as [his]126-arthur questions began to be pressing again -- as [he]126-arthur began to hint at [some particular man]2408-some particular man , [she]2403-her did n't know who -- [Powder]159-powder had come in to show [him]126-arthur up to [one of [the spare - rooms]2410-the spare - rooms]2409-one of the spare - rooms to prepare for dinner ; and soon after dinner the motor was at the door , and [Powder]159-powder ( again acting for [Providence]205-providence ) had ventured to suggest , [sir]3176-sir , that in view of the slippery state of [the roads]2412-the roads it would be well to get off as promptly as possible . And [Nona]102-nona had taken over the seeing - off , and with a long sigh of relief [Pauline]108-pauline had turned back into [the library]952-the library , where [Wyant]105-lita 's empty whisky - and - soda glass and ash - tray stood , so uncannily , on the table by [[her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband 's armchair . Yes ; [she]2403-her had been thankful when it was over ... And now [she]2403-her was thankful that it had happened . The encounter had fortified [her]2403-her confidence in [her]2403-her own methods and given [her]2403-her a new proof of [her]2403-her power to surmount obstacles by smiling [them]2415-them away . [She]2403-her had literally smiled [Arthur]126-arthur out of [the house]530-the house , when [some women]2104-some women , in a similar emergency , would have made a scene , or stood on [their]2104-some women dignity . Dignity ! [Hers]2403-her consisted , more than ever , in believing the best of every one , in persuading [herself]2403-her and [others]2774-others that to impute evil was to create it , and to disbelieve it was to prevent its coming into being . Those were [the Scientific Initiate]268-the scientific initiate 's very words : " [We]3869-we manufacture sorrow as [we]3869-we do all the other toxins . "[268-the scientific initiate] How grateful [she]2403-her was to [him]126-arthur for that formula ! And how light and happy it made [her]2403-her feel to know that [she]2403-her had borne it in mind , and proved its truth , at so crucial a moment ! [She]2403-her looked back with pity at [her]2403-her own past moods of distrust , [her]2403-her wretched impulses of jealousy and suspicion , the moments when even those nearest [her]2403-her had not been proof against [her]2403-her morbid apprehensions ... How absurd and far away it all seemed now ! [Jim]110-jim was coming back the day after tomorrow . [Lita]105-lita and [the baby]378-the baby were going [home]2630-home to [him]126-arthur . And the day after that [they]2421-they would all be going back to [town]2627-town ; and then the last touches would be put to the ceremonial of the Cardinal 's reception . Oh , [she]2403-her and [Powder]159-powder would have [their]2421-they hands full ! All of the big silver - gilt service would have to be got out of the safety vaults and gone over ... Luckily the last reports of [Mrs. Bruss]241-mrs. bruss 's state were favourable , and no doubt [Maisie]104-maisie would be back as usual ... Yes , life was really falling into its usual busy and pleasurable routine . Rest in [the country]349-the country was all very well ; but rest , if overdone , became fatiguing ... [She]2403-her found [herself]2403-her in bed , the lights turned off , and sleep descending on [her]2403-her softly . Before it held [her]2403-her , [she]2403-her caught , through misty distances , the sound of [[her]2403-her husband]556-her husband 's footfall , the opening and shutting of [his]556-her husband door , and the muffled noises of [his]556-her husband undressing . Well ... so [he]556-her husband was back ... and [Lita]105-lita ... [silly Lita]105-lita ... no harm , really ... Just as well [they]2421-they had n't met poor [Arthur]126-arthur ... Everything was all right ... the Cardinal ... XXX [PAULINE]108-pauline sat up suddenly in bed . It was as if an invisible hand had touched a spring in [her]2403-her spinal column , and set [her]2403-her upright in the darkness before [she]2403-her was aware of any reason for it . No doubt [she]2403-her had heard something through [her]2403-her sleep ; but what ? [She]2403-her listened for a repetition of the sound . All was silence . [She]2403-her stretched out [her]2403-her hand to an onyx knob on the table by [her]2403-her bed , and instantly the face of a miniature clock was illuminated , and the hour chimed softly ; two strokes followed by one . Half - past two -- the silentest hour of the night ; and in the vernal hush of [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge ! Yet certainly there had been a sound -- a sharp explosive sound ... Again ! There it was : a revolver shot ... somewhere in [the house]530-the house ... [Burglars]269-burglars ? [Her]2403-her feet were in [her]2403-her slippers , [her]2403-her hand on the electric light switch . All the while [she]2403-her continued to listen intently . Dead silence everywhere ... But how had [burglars]2426-burglars got in without starting the alarm ? Ah -- [she]2403-her remembered ! [Powder]159-powder had orders never to set it while [any one]374-any one was out of [the house]530-the house ; it was [Dexter]103-dexter who should have seen that it was connected when [he]2429-he got back from [Greystock]80-greystock with [Lita]105-lita . And naturally [he]2429-he had forgotten to . [Pauline]108-pauline was on [her]108-pauline feet , [her]108-pauline hair smoothed back under [her]108-pauline fillet - shaped cap of silver lace , [her]108-pauline " rest - gown "[108-pauline] of silvery silk slipped over [her]108-pauline night - dress . This emergency garb always lay at [her]108-pauline bedside in case of nocturnal alarms , and [she]108-pauline was equipped in an instant , and had already reconnected the burglar - alarm , and sounded the general summons for [Powder]159-powder , [the footmen]1846-the footmen , [the gardeners]2431-the gardeners and [chauffeurs]2432-chauffeurs . [Her]108-pauline hand played irresolutely over the complicated knobs of the glittering switchboard which filled a panel of [[her]108-pauline dressing - room]454-her dressing - room ; then [she]108-pauline pressed the button marked " [Engine - house]1963-engine - house . "[108-pauline] Why not ? There had been a series of bad suburban burglaries lately , and [one]325-one never knew ... It was just as well to rouse [the neighbourhood]1865-the neighbourhood ... [Dexter]103-dexter was so careless . Very likely [he]2436-his had left the front door open . Silence still -- profounder than ever . Not a sound since that second shot , if shot it was . Very softly [she]108-pauline opened [her]108-pauline door and paused in the anteroom between [[her]108-pauline room]960-her room and [[her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband 's . " [Dexter]103-dexter ! "[108-pauline] [she]108-pauline called . No answer ; no responding flash of light . [Men]2738-men slept so heavily . [She]108-pauline opened , lighted--"Dexter ! "[108-pauline] [The room]317-the room was empty , [[her]108-pauline husband]556-her husband 's bed unslept in . But then -- what ? Those sounds of [his]2436-his return ? Had [she]108-pauline been dreaming when [she]108-pauline thought [she]108-pauline heard them ? Or was it [the burglars [she]108-pauline had heard]2442-the burglars she had heard , looting [[his]2436-his room]2178-his room , a few feet off from where [she]108-pauline lay ? In spite of [her]108-pauline physical courage a shiver ran over [her]108-pauline ... But if [Dexter]103-dexter and [Lita]105-lita were not yet back , whence had the sound of the shot come , and who had fired it ? [She]108-pauline trembled at the thought of [Nona]102-nona -- [Nona]102-nona and [the baby]378-the baby ! [They]2445-they were alone with [[the baby]378-the baby 's nurse]2447-the baby 's nurse on [the farther side of [the house]530-the house]2448-the farther side of the house . And [the house]530-the house seemed suddenly so immense , so resonant , so empty ... In [the shadowy corridor outside [[her]108-pauline room]960-her room]2451-the shadowy corridor outside her room [she]108-pauline paused again for a second , straining [her]108-pauline ears for a guiding sound ; then [she]108-pauline sped on , pushing back the swinging door which divided [the farther wing]2453-the farther wing from [hers]108-pauline , turning on the lights with a flying hand as [she]108-pauline ran ... On the deeply carpeted floors [her]108-pauline foot - fall made no sound , and [she]108-pauline had the sense of skimming over the ground inaudibly , like something ghostly , disembodied , which had no power to break the hush and make itself heard ... Half way down [the passage]2454-the passage [she]108-pauline was startled to see the door of [[Lita]105-lita 's bedroom]2455-lita 's bedroom open . Sounds at last -- sounds low , confused and terrified -- issued from it . What kind of sounds ? [Pauline]108-pauline could not tell ; they were rushing together in a vortex in [her]108-pauline brain . [She]108-pauline heard [herself]108-pauline scream " Help ! "[108-pauline] with the strangled voice of a nightmare , and was comforted to feel the rush of other feet behind [her]108-pauline : [Powder]159-powder , [the men]2121-the men - [servants]2457-servants , [the maids]2458-the maids . Thank [God]145-god the system worked ! Whatever [she]108-pauline was coming to , at least [they]2459-they would be there to help ... "[102-nona] The door of [the room]317-the room was wide now , and [Powder]159-powder stood there , unnaturally thin and gaunt in [his]159-powder improvised collarless garb , marshalling [the gaping footmen]2477-the gaping footmen , with [gardeners]2478-gardeners , chauffeurs and [maids]2479-maids crowding [the corridor]2480-the corridor behind [them]2477-the gaping footmen . " [Dexter]103-dexter , "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline cried , " help [me]108-pauline to lift [her]108-pauline to the bed . "[108-pauline] Outside , through the watchful hush of the night , a rattle and roar came up [the drive]1841-the drive . It filled the silence with an unnatural clamour , immense , mysterious and menacing . [Pauline]108-pauline , bending over [[her]108-pauline daughter]917-her daughter 's face , fancied [she]108-pauline caught a wan smile on it ... XXXI [NONA MANFORD]102-nona ['S room]2489-'s room was full of spring flowers . [They]2490-they had poured in , sent by [sympathizing friends]2491-sympathizing friends , ever since [she]102-nona had been brought back to [town]2627-town from [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge . That was two weeks ago . It was full spring now , and [her]102-nona windows stood wide to the May sunset slanting across [the room]317-the room , and giving back to the tall branches of blossoming plum and cherry something of their native scent and freshness . The reminder of [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge would once have doubled [their]2490-they beauty ; now it made [her]102-nona shut [her]102-nona eyes sharply , in the inner recoil from all the name brought back . [She]102-nona was still confined to [[her]102-nona room]960-her room , for the shot which had fractured [her]102-nona arm near the shoulder had also grazed [her]102-nona lung , and [her]102-nona temperature remained obstinately high . Shock , [the doctors]1891-the doctors said , chiefly ... the appalling sight of [a masked burglar]2496-a masked burglar in [[[her]102-nona sister - in - law]331-her sister - in - law 's bedroom]2498-her sister - in - law 's bedroom ; and being twice fired at -- twice ! [Lita]105-lita corroborated the story . [She]105-lita had been asleep when [her]105-lita door was softly opened , and [she]105-lita had started up to see [a man in a mask , with a dark lantern ... Yes]2499-a man in a mask , with a dark lantern ... yes ; [she]105-lita was almost sure [he]2499-a man in a mask , with a dark lantern ... yes had a mask ; at any rate [she]105-lita could n't see [his]2499-a man in a mask , with a dark lantern ... yes face ; [the police]2750-the police had found the track of muddy feet on the pantry linoleum , and up the back stairs . [Lita]105-lita had screamed , and [Nona]102-nona had dashed to the rescue ; yes , and [Mr. Manford]113-mr. manford -- [Lita]105-lita thought [Mr. Manford]113-mr. manford had perhaps got [there]2641-there before [Nona]102-nona . But then again , [she]105-lita was n't sure ... The fact was that [Lita]105-lita had been shattered by the night 's experience , and [her]105-lita evidence , if not self - contradictory , was at least incoherent . [The only really lucid witnesses]2502-the only really lucid witnesses were [Powder]159-powder , [the butler]563-the butler , and [Nona Manford]102-nona [herself]102-nona . [Their]2502-the only really lucid witnesses statements agreed exactly , or at least dovetailed into each other with perfect precision , [the one completing the other]2504-the one completing the other . [Nona]102-nona had been first on the scene : [she]102-nona had seen [the man in [the room]317-the room]2505-the man in the room -- [she]102-nona too thought that [he]2505-the man in the room was masked -- and [he]2505-the man in the room had turned on [her]102-nona and fired . At that moment [[her]102-nona father]369-her father , hearing the shots , had rushed in , half - dressed ; and as [he]369-her father did so [the burglar]3885-the burglar fled . [Some one]1280-some one professed to have seen [him]2505-the man in the room running away through the rain and darkness ; but [no one]425-no one had seen [his]2505-the man in the room face , and there was no way of identifying [him]2505-the man in the room . The only positive proof of [his]2505-the man in the room presence -- except for the shot -- was the discovery by [Powder]159-powder , of those carefully guarded footprints on the pantry floor ; and these , of course , might eventually help to trace [the criminal]2511-the criminal . As for the revolver , that also had disappeared ; and the bullets , one of which had been found lodged in the door , the other in the panelling of [the room]317-the room , were of ordinary army calibre , and offered no clue . Altogether it was an interesting problem for [the police , who were reported to be actively at work on it , though so far without visible results]2513-the police , who were reported to be actively at work on it , though so far without visible results . Then , after three days of flaming headlines and journalistic conjectures , another sensation crowded out the Cedarledge burglary . The newspaper public , bored with the inability of [the police]2750-the police to provide fresh fuel for [their]2750-the police curiosity , ceased to speculate on the affair , and interest in it faded out as quickly as it had flared up . During the last few days [Nona]102-nona 's temperature had gradually dropped , and [she]102-nona had been allowed to see [visitors]1319-visitors ; first one in the day , then two or three , then four or five -- so that by this time [her]102-nona jaws were beginning to feel a little stiff with the continual rehearsal of [her]102-nona story , embellished ( at [the visitors]2516-the visitors ' request ) with an analysis of [her]102-nona own emotions . [She]102-nona always repeated [her]102-nona narrative in exactly the same terms , and presented the incidents in exactly the same order ; by now [she]102-nona had even learned to pause at the precise point where [she]102-nona knew [[her]102-nona sympathizing auditors]2517-her sympathizing auditors would say : " But , [[my]102-nona dear]2629-my dear , how perfectly awful -- what did it feel like ? "[102-nona] " Like being shot in the arm . "[102-nona] " Oh , [Nona]102-nona , [you]102-nona 're so cynical ! But before that -- when [you]102-nona _ saw the man_--weren't [you]102-nona absolutely sick with terror ? "[102-nona] " [He]3890-he did n't give [me]102-nona time to be sick with anything but the pain in [my]102-nona shoulder . "[102-nona] " [You]102-nona 'll never get [her]102-nona to confess that [she]102-nona was frightened ! "[102-nona] And so the dialogue went on . Did [[her]102-nona listeners]2518-her listeners notice that [she]102-nona recited [her]102-nona tale with the unvarying precision of a lesson learned by heart ? Probably not ; if [they]2518-her listeners did , [they]2518-her listeners made no sign . The papers had all been full of the burglary at [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge : [a masked burglar]2496-a masked burglar -- and of the shooting of [Miss Manford]175-miss manford , and [the would - be murderer]2520-the would - be murderer 's escape . The account , blood - curdling and definite , had imposed itself on the public credulity with all the authority of heavy headlines and continual repetition . Within twenty - four hours the [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge burglary was an established fact , and [suburban millionaires]2521-suburban millionaires were doubling the number of [[their]2521-suburban millionaires night watchmen]2522-their night watchmen , and looking into the newest thing in burglar - alarms . [Nona]102-nona , leaning back wearily on [her]102-nona couch , wondered how soon [she]102-nona would be allowed to travel and get away from it all . [The others]772-the others were all going to travel . [[Her]102-nona mother]276-her mother and [father]2633-father were off that very evening to [the Rocky Mountains]93-the rocky mountains and [Vancouver]94-vancouver . From [there]2641-there [they]2527-their were going to [Japan]95-japan and , in the early autumn , to [Ceylon]96-ceylon and [India]97-india . [Pauline]108-pauline already had letters to [all the foremost Native Princes]2528-all the foremost native princes , and was regretting that there was not likely to be [a Durbar]2529-a durbar during [their]2527-their visit . [The Manfords]251-the manfords did not expect to be back till January or February ; [Manford]102-nona 's professional labours had become so exhausting that [the doctors]1891-the doctors , fearing [his]2531-his accumulated fatigue might lead to a nervous break - down , had ordered a complete change and prolonged absence from affairs . [Pauline]108-pauline hoped that [Nona]102-nona would meet [them]2527-their in [Egypt]98-egypt on [their]2527-their way [home]2630-home . A sunny Christmas together in [Cairo]99-cairo would be so lovely ... [Arthur Wyant]107-wyant had gone also -- to [Canada]100-canada , it was said , with [cousin Eleanor]135-cousin eleanor in attendance . [Some]2533-some insinuated that [a private inebriate asylum in [Maine]73-maine]2534-a private inebriate asylum in maine was the goal of [his]2531-his journey ; but [no one]425-no one really knew , and [few]2536-few cared . [[His]2531-his remaining cronies]2537-his remaining cronies , when [they]2537-his remaining cronies heard that [he]2531-his had been ill , and was to travel for a change , shrugged or smiled , and said : " [Poor old Arthur]107-wyant -- been going it too strong again , "[2537-his remaining cronies] and then forgot about [him]2531-his . [He]2531-his had long since lost [his]2531-his place in the scheme of things . Even [Lita]105-lita and [Jim Wyant]110-jim were on a journey . [They]2538-they had sailed the previous week for [Paris]85-paris , where [they]2538-they would arrive in time for the late spring season , and [Lita]105-lita would see the Grand Prix , the new fashions and the new plays . [Jim]110-jim 's holiday had been extended to the end of August : [Manford]102-nona , ever solicitous for [[his]2531-his stepson]2539-his stepson , had arranged the matter with the bank . It was natural , [every one]1005-every one agreed , that [Jim]110-jim should have been dreadfully upset by the ghastly episode at [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge , in which [[his]110-jim wife]389-his wife might have been [a victim]2542-a victim as well as [Nona]102-nona ; and [[his]110-jim intimates]2543-his intimates knew how much [he]110-jim had worried about [[his]110-jim father]343-his father 's growing intemperance . Altogether , both [Wyants]116-jim and [Manfords]251-the manfords had been subjected to an unusual strain ; and when [rich people]2545-rich people 's nerves are out of gear the pleasant remedy of travel is the first prescribed . [Nona]102-nona turned [her]102-nona head uneasily on the cushions . [She]102-nona felt incurably weary , and unable to rebound to the spring radiance which usually set [her]102-nona blood in motion . [Her]102-nona immobility had begun to wear on [her]102-nona . At first it had been a relief to be quiescent , to be out of things , to be offered up as [the passive victim]2546-the passive victim and the accepted evidence of the Cedarledge burglary . But now [she]102-nona was sick to nausea of the part , and envious of the others who could escape by flight -- by perpetual evasion . Not that [she]102-nona really wanted to be [one of [them]2548-them]2547-one of them ; [she]102-nona was not sure that [she]102-nona wanted to go away at all -- at least in the body . Spiritual escape was what [she]102-nona craved ; but by what means , and whither ? Perhaps it could best be attained by staying just where [she]102-nona was , by sticking fast to [her]102-nona few square feet of obligations and responsibilities . But even this idea made no special appeal . [Her]102-nona obligations , [her]102-nona responsibilities -- what were they ? Negative , at best , like everything else in [her]102-nona life . [She]102-nona had thought that renunciation would mean freedom -- would mean at least escape . But today it seemed to mean only a closer self - imprisonment . [She]102-nona was tired , no doubt ... There was a tap on the door , and [[her]102-nona mother]276-her mother entered . [Nona]102-nona raised [her]102-nona listless eyes curiously . [She]102-nona always looked at [[her]102-nona mother]276-her mother with curiosity now : curiosity not so much as to what had changed in [her]102-nona , but as to what had remained the same . And it was extraordinary how [Pauline]108-pauline , [the old Pauline]2551-the old pauline , was coming to the surface again through the new one , the haggard and stricken apparition of [the Cedarledge midnight]5-cedarledge ... " [My]102-nona broken arm saved [her]108-pauline , "[102-nona] [Nona]102-nona thought , remembering , with a sort of ironical admiration , how [that dishevelled spectre]2552-that dishevelled spectre had become [Pauline Manford]108-pauline again , in command of [herself]102-nona and the situation , as soon as [she]102-nona could seize on its immediate , its practical , sides ; could grasp those handles of reality to which [she]102-nona always clung . Now even [that stern and disciplined figure]2553-that stern and disciplined figure had vanished , giving way , as the days passed and reassurance grew , to the usual , the everyday [Pauline]108-pauline , smilingly confident in [herself]108-pauline and in the general security of things . Had that dreadful night at [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge ever been a reality to [her]102-nona ? If it had , [Nona]102-nona was sure , it had already faded into the realms of fable , since its one visible result had been [[her]276-her mother daughter]917-her daughter 's injury , and that was on the way to healing . Everything else connected with it had happened out of sight and under ground , and for that reason was now as if it had never existed for [Pauline]108-pauline , who was more than ever resolutely two - dimensional . Physically , at least , the only difference [Nona]102-nona could detect was that a skilful make - up had filled in the lines which , in spite of all the arts of [the face - restorers]2555-the face - restorers , were weaving their permanent web about [[her]917-her daughter mother]276-her mother 's lips and eyes . Under this delicate mask [Pauline]108-pauline 's face looked younger and fresher than ever , and as smooth and empty as if [she]108-pauline had just been born again--"And [she]108-pauline _ has _ , after all , "[102-nona] [Nona]102-nona concluded . [She]102-nona sat down by the couch , and laid a light hand caressingly on [[her]102-nona daughter]917-her daughter 's . " [Darling]271-darling ! Had [your]271-darling tea ? [You]271-darling feel really better , do n't [you]271-darling ? [The doctor]2847-the doctor says the massage is to begin tomorrow . By the way-- "[102-nona] [she]102-nona tossed a handful of newspaper cuttings onto the coverlet--"perhaps some of these things about the reception may amuse [you]271-darling . [Maisie]104-maisie 's been saving them to show [you]271-darling . Of course most of the foreign names are wrong ; but the description of [the room]317-the room is rather good . [I]102-nona believe [Tommy Ardwin]131-ardwin wrote the article for the ' Looker - on . ' [Amalasuntha]117-amalasuntha says [the Cardinal]457-the cardinal will like it . [It]3894-it seems [he]457-the cardinal was delighted with the idea of the flash - light photographs . Altogether [he]457-the cardinal was very much pleased . "[102-nona] " Then [you]271-darling ought to be , [mother]2638-mother . "[102-nona] [Nona]102-nona forced [her]102-nona pale lips into a smile . " [I]102-nona _ am _ , [dear]2609-dear . If [I]102-nona do a thing at all [I]102-nona like to do it well . That 's always been [my]102-nona theory , [you]2609-dear know : the best or nothing . And [I]102-nona do believe it was a success . But perhaps [I]102-nona 'm tiring [you--]2609-dear . "[102-nona] [Pauline]108-pauline stood up irresolutely . [She]108-pauline had never been good at bedsides unless [she]108-pauline could play some active and masterful part there . [Nona]102-nona was aware that [[her]102-nona mother]276-her mother 's moments alone with [her]108-pauline had become increasingly difficult as [her]108-pauline strength had returned , and there was nothing more to be done for [her]108-pauline . It 's only that things still tire [me]108-pauline a little-- "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline lingered , looking down on [the girl]299-the girl with an expression of anxiety struggling through [her]108-pauline smooth rejuvenation . " [You]299-the girl must be awfully busy with all the last things to be done . "[108-pauline] " Well , [Maisie]104-maisie is clamouring for [me]108-pauline , "[108-pauline] [Pauline]108-pauline confessed from the threshold . The door shut , and [Nona]102-nona closed [her]102-nona eyes with a sigh . Tomorrow -- tomorrow [she]102-nona would be alone ! And in a week , perhaps , [she]102-nona would get back to [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge , and lie on [the terrace]1869-the terrace with the dogs about [her]102-nona , and [no one to ask questions]2561-no one to ask questions , to hint and sympathize , or be discreet and evasive ... Yes , in spite of everything , the idea of returning to [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge now seemed more bearable than any other ... In a restless attempt to ease [her]102-nona position [she]102-nona stretched [her]102-nona hand out , and it came in contact with the bundle of newspaper cuttings . [She]102-nona shrank back with a little grimace ; then [she]102-nona smiled . After the night at [Cedarledge]5-cedarledge [every one]1005-every one had supposed -- even [Maisie]104-maisie and [Powder]159-powder had -- that [the Cardinal]457-the cardinal 's reception would have to be given up , since , owing to [his]457-the cardinal Eminence 's impending departure , it could not be deferred . But it had come off on the appointed day -- only the fourth after the burglary -- and [Pauline]108-pauline had made it a success . [The girl]299-the girl really admired [[her]299-the girl mother]276-her mother for that . Something in [her]299-the girl own composition responded to the energy with which [the older woman]607-the older woman could meet an emergency when there was no way of turning it . The party had been not only brilliant but entertaining . [Every one]1005-every one had been [there]2641-there , [all the official and ecclesiastical dignitaries]2569-all the official and ecclesiastical dignitaries , including [the Bishop of [New York]2-new york]450-the bishop of new york and [the Chief Rabbi]452-the chief rabbi -- yes , even [the Scientific Initiate]2295-the scientific initiate , looking colossal and Siberian in some half - priestly dress that added its note to the general picturesqueness ; and yet there had been no crush , no confusion , nothing to detract from the dignity and amenity of the evening . [Nona]102-nona suspected [[her]102-nona mother]276-her mother of longing to invite [the Mahatma , whose Oriental garb would have been so effective , and who would have been so flattered , poor man]2574-the mahatma , whose oriental garb would have been so effective , and who would have been so flattered , poor man ! But [she]102-nona had not risked it , and [her]102-nona chief lion , after [the great ecclesiastics]2575-the great ecclesiastics , had turned out to be [Michelangelo]182-michelangelo , the newly arrived , with the film - glamour enhancing [his]182-michelangelo noble Roman beauty , and [[his]182-michelangelo mother]342-his mother at [his]182-michelangelo side , explaining and parading [him]182-michelangelo . " The pity is that dear [Jim]116-jim and [Lita]105-lita have sailed , "[2723-the marchesa] [the Marchesa]2723-the marchesa declared to [all who would give ear]2578-all who would give ear . " That 's really a great disappointment . [I]2723-the marchesa did hope [Lita]105-lita would have been [here]2666-here tonight . "[2723-the marchesa] And [she]2723-the marchesa mingled [her]2723-the marchesa hopes and regrets with [Mrs. Percy Landish]128-mrs. landish 's . XXXII [NONA]102-nona shut [her]102-nona eyes again . Ever since that intolerable night [she]102-nona had ached with the incessant weariness of not being able to sleep , and of trying to hide from those about [her]102-nona how brief [her]102-nona intervals of oblivion had been . During the hours of darkness [she]102-nona seemed to be forever toiling down perspectives of noise and glare , like a wanderer in [the labyrinth of [an unknown city]2580-an unknown city]2579-the labyrinth of an unknown city . Even [her]102-nona snatches of sleep were so crowded with light and noise , so dazzled with the sense of exposure , that [she]102-nona was not conscious of the respite till it was over . It was only by day , alone in [[her]102-nona room]960-her room , that [her]102-nona lids , in closing , sometimes shut things out ... Such a respite came to [her]102-nona now ; and [she]102-nona started up out of nothingness to find [[her]102-nona father]369-her father at [her]102-nona side . [She]102-nona had not expected to see [him]369-her father alone before [they]2583-they parted . [She]102-nona had fancied that [[her]102-nona parents]1734-her parents would contrive to postpone [their]1734-her parents joint farewells till after dinner , just before driving off to [[their]1734-her parents train]2585-their train . For a moment [she]102-nona lay and looked up at [Manford]102-nona without being clearly conscious that [he]369-her father was there , and without knowing what to say if [he]369-her father were . It appeared that [he]369-her father did not know either . Perhaps [he]369-her father had been led to [her]102-nona side , almost in spite of [himself]369-her father , by a vague craving to be alone with [her]102-nona just once before [they]2583-they parted ; or perhaps [he]369-her father had come because [he]369-her father suspected [she]102-nona might think [he]369-her father was afraid to . [He]369-her father sat down without speaking in the chair which [Pauline]108-pauline had left . [Dusk]274-dusk had fallen , and [Nona]102-nona was aware of the presence at [her]102-nona side only as a shadowy bulk . After a while [[her]102-nona father]369-her father put out [his]369-her father hand and laid it on [hers]102-nona . " Why , it 's nearly dark , "[102-nona] [she]102-nona said . " [You]369-her father 'll be off in an hour or so now . "[102-nona] " Yes . [[Your]102-nona mother]2610-your mother and [I]102-nona are dining early . "[102-nona] [She]102-nona wound [her]102-nona fingers into [his]369-her father , and [they]2587-they sat silent again . [She]102-nona liked to have [him]369-her father near [her]102-nona in this way , but [she]102-nona was glad , for [his]369-her father sake and [her]102-nona own , that the twilight made [his]369-her father face indistinct . [She]102-nona hoped [their]2587-they silence might be unbroken . As long as [she]102-nona neither saw nor heard [him]369-her father there was an unaccountable comfort in feeling [him]369-her father near -- as if the living warmth [he]369-her father imparted were something [they]2587-they shared indissolubly . " In a couple of hours now-- "[369-her father] [he]369-her father began , with an attempt at briskness . [She]102-nona was silent , and [he]369-her father went on : " [I]369-her father wanted to be with [you]102-nona alone for a minute like this . [I]369-her father wanted to say-- "[369-her father] " [Father--]3909-father-- . "[369-her father] [He]369-her father turned suddenly in [his]369-her father chair , and bending down over [her]102-nona pressed [his]369-her father forehead against the coverlet . [She]102-nona freed [her]102-nona hand and passed it through the thin hair on [his]369-her father temples . " Do n't . There 's nothing to say . "[102-nona] [She]102-nona felt a tremor of [his]369-her father shoulders as [they]2587-they pressed against [her]102-nona , and the tremor ran through [her]102-nona own body and seemed to loosen the fibres of [her]102-nona heart . " [Old dad]3910-old dad . "[102-nona] " [Nona]102-nona . "[369-her father] After that [they]2588-they remained again without speaking till a clock chimed out from somewhere in the shadows . [Manford]102-nona got up . [He]369-her father gave [himself]369-her father one of [his]369-her father impatient shakes , and stooped to kiss [[his]369-her father daughter]341-his daughter on the forehead . " [Nona]102-nona , [darling]2893-darling ! "[341-his daughter] There were still the goodbyes to [[her]341-his daughter mother]276-her mother to be gone through . Well , that would be comparatively easy ; and in [a lighted room]2592-a lighted room too , with [Pauline]108-pauline on the threshold , slim , erect and consciously equipped for travel -- complete and wonderful ! "[108-pauline] " Do n't ask [me]108-pauline to promise anything yet , [mother]2638-mother . " [I]108-pauline never heard anything so horrible , "[108-pauline] [she]108-pauline said . THE END * * *
